examples: (1) We had to push our way through the crowd.(2) From across the fields came cheers of the crowd.(3) A large crowd was waiting at the bus stop.(4) A crowd gathered at the scene of the fire.(5) That's just what you get from hanging out with the wrong crowd.(6) Everyone in the restaurant crowded around them and started singing.(7) The room was crowded with guests.(8) Hundreds of people crowded the street.(9) Images of the accident kept crowding my mind.(10) A bevy of reporters crowded toward the candidate.(11) He crowded the debtor for payment.
(1) 我们得从人群中挤过去。(2) 从田野的那一边传来群众的欢呼声。(3) 一大群人在公共汽车站等候。(4) 许多人聚集在火灾现场。(5) 交错了朋友就是这样的下场。(6) 餐厅里的所有人都挤在他们周围,开始放声高歌。(7) 房间里挤满了客人。(8) 大街上挤满了几百个人。(9) 那场事故的情景不断在我脑海里涌现。(10) 一群记者涌向候选人。(11) 他催逼负债人还债。

translation: adj.拥挤的
examples: (1) Guests were crowded into the few remaining rooms.(2) The robbery occurred in broad daylight, in a crowded street.(3) He tried to squeeze himself onto the crowded bus.
(1) 把客人都挤在剩余的几个房间里了。(2) 在拥挤的街道上，光天化日之下竟发生了抢劫。(3) 他设法挤上了那辆拥挤的公共汽车。

translation: adj.残酷的；残忍的；引起痛苦的
examples: (1) The feudal barons were cruel to the people.(2) That emperor was a cruel despot.(3) The death of their daughter was a cruel blow.(4) He is a cruel assassin.(5) We shouldn't be cruel to animals.(6) In fairy stories, the ogre is cruel and eats people.(7) His cruel remarks cut me deeply.
(1) 封建贵族对人民很残酷。(2) 那个皇帝是个残酷的专制君主。(3) 女儿的死对他们是一个残酷的打击。(4) 他是个残忍的杀手。(5) 我们不应该对动物残忍。(6) 在神话故事中，魔鬼很残忍而且吃人。(7) 他那无情的话太伤我的心了。

translation: n.立方体；立方vt.求 ... 的立方adj.立方的
examples: (1) A cube is a three-dimensional object.(2) Three cubed is twenty-seven.(3) If you cube 1 0 , the result is 1 0 0 0 .(4) The National Aquatic Center is also called "water cube ".
(1) 立方体是三维物体。(2) 三的立方是二十七。(3) 如果你求10的立方，得出的结果是1000。(4) 国家游泳中心又被称为“水立方”。

translation: adj.立方体的；立方的
examples: (1) This box is a cubic object.(2) The volume of this container is 20 cubic meters.(3) What's the cubic capacity of this engine?
(1) 这个盒子是个立方体。(2) 这个集装箱的体积是20立方米。(3) 这台发动机的立体容积是多少？

translation: n.烹饪；佳肴
examples: (1) Chinese cuisine is very different from European.(2) I studied Greek cuisine for one year.(3) After that, they might end their day dining in a restaurant that serves Chinese cuisine.(4) The hotel restaurant is noted for its excellent cuisine.(5) The tourists decided to go native and sample the local cuisine.
(1) 中国烹饪与欧洲烹饪有很大区别。(2) 我学了一年的希腊菜烹饪法。(3) 然后他俩可能会去一家中国餐馆吃晚饭，以此来结束一天的活动。(4) 这家旅馆的餐厅以美味佳肴闻名遐迩。(5) 观光客们决定过一下土人生活并品尝当地佳肴。

translation: n.栽培；文化；教养vt.培养，栽培
examples: (1) He has to learn the culture of bees.(2) She has studied the cultures of Oriental countries.(3) The culture of the mind is vital.
(1) 他得学养蜂。(2) 她研究过东方各国的文化。(3) 修心养性是极其重要的。

translation: n.治疗；治愈；疗法；对策v.治愈；治疗；纠正
examples: (1) There is no effective cure for colds except rest.(2) There is still no cure for the common cold.(3) The cure for stress lies in learning to relax.(4) I tried every cure you can think of.(5) When I left the hpsoital I was completely cured.(6) The only way to cure backache is to rest.(7) He tried to cure his child of the habit.
(1) 除了多休息,没有有效的方法可以治疗感冒。(2) 目前仍没有治愈感冒的良药。(3) 消除紧张的方法在于学会放松。(4) 我试过了一切能想到的解脱办法。(5) 出院时，我已经完全痊愈了。(6) 治疗背痛的唯一办法是休息。(7) 他试着去矫正他孩子的那种习惯。

translation: adj.好奇的；奇特的
examples: (1) I am curious how she will receive the news.(2) The boy was curious about everything he saw.(3) I caught a curious sound in the neighboring room.(4) It's curious that he didn't tell you.
(1) 我很想知道她如何接受那消息。(2) 那男孩对所见的一切都感到好奇。(3) 我听到隔壁房间里有奇怪的响声。(4) 他没有告诉你，实在反常。

translation: n.货币；流通
examples: (1) The president proclaimed that a new currency would be issued.(2) Our currency will not be depreciated.(3) There are currency restrictions on the sums allowed for foreign travel.(4) The word has attained general currency.
(1) 总统宣布将发行新货币。(2) 我们的货币不会贬值。(3) 到国外旅行允许携带的款额有所限制。(4) 这个词已经通用起来了。

translation: n.全部课程；课程
examples: (1) Our curriculum comprises Politics, Chinese, English and History.(2) Our mathematics curriculum is much more complicated now.
(1) 我们的课程共有四门：政治、汉语、英语、历史。(2) 我们的数学课现在复杂得多了。

translation: n.窗帘；门帘；幕(布)vt.(用帘)装饰；(以帘)遮蔽
examples: (1) The curtain was suddenly drawn and a bright light shone in.(2) She came upon a low curtain she had not noticed before.(3) She kept peering through the side curtain.(4) The curtain rose to disclose a stunning set.(5) I bought enough material to curtain the house.(6) Night could not curtain his guilt.(7) We can curtain off each bed in the hospital.
(1) 突然窗帘拉了开来，一道强光照了进来。(2) 她发现刚才没有注意到的一个低垂的门帘。(3) 她不时地从旁边的幕帐向外窥视。(4) 布帘被揭开暴露出极好的布。(5) 我买了不少布料，足够做房子的窗帘用。(6) 黑夜无法掩藏他的罪行。(7) 我们可以用布帘将医院内的病床每张隔开。

translation: n.垫子；橡皮软垫；缓冲vt.加垫褥；放在垫子上；保护；减缓；为 ... 装垫子
examples: (1) He covered the cushion with new material.(2) She embroidered the cushion with flowers.(3) A hovercraft rides on a cushion of air.(4) The bush acted as a cushion to my fall.(5) We are going to cushion the rocking chair so that it is more comfortable.(6) The kid poked holes in the cushion.(7) Amy reposed her head on a cushion.(8) We try to cushion our children from the hard realities of life.(9) His hat helped to cushion the blow.(10) Nothing can cushion the shock of the tragedy.
(1) 他给靠垫蒙上了新的料子。(2) 她把垫子绣上了花。(3) 气垫船悬浮在气垫上行驶.(4) 这灌木在我摔下时起了缓冲作用。(5) 我们要在摇椅上铺软垫，那么就会更舒适了。(6) 孩子们在垫子上扎了几个洞。(7) 艾咪把头靠在垫子上。(8) 我们试图保护我们的孩子们免受严酷的现实生活的煎熬。(9) 他的帽子减轻了这下打击。(10) 没有什麽能减轻那个悲剧的冲击。

translation: n.习惯；风俗；惯例（复）Customs: 海关；关税adj.定做的；定制的
examples: (1) The custom has now become a rule.(2) It is my custom to go for a walk before breakfast.(3) Custom rules the law.(4) The custom prevails over the whole area.(5) Please enter a name for the custom controller.

examples: (1) The seasons of the year make a cycle.(2) The business cycle experienced a sudden down.(3) A cycle of the sun takes a year.(4) I go to school by cycle every day.(5) There are thousands of cycle paths in Holland.(6) Her latest stunt is riding a motor cycle through a ring of flames.(7) I usually cycle home through the park.(8) It's easier to cycle with the wind behind you.(9) This machine automatically cycles.(10) You can press TAB to cycle through the windows.
(1) 一年四季构成一个循环。(2) 商业周期经历了突然的萧条。(3) 太阳循环周期需要一年。(4) 我每天骑自行车上学。(5) 荷兰有数千条自行车道。(6) 她的最新特技表演是骑摩托车钻火圈。(7) 我通常骑自行车穿过公园回家。(8) 顺风骑车省力。(9) 这台机器能够自动轮转。(10) 你可以按Tab键循环切换窗口。

translation: n.骑自行车的人
examples: (1) The cyclist was run down by a lorry.
(1) 卡车把骑自行车的人撞倒了。

translation: adj.商业的n.商业广告
examples: (1) Do you fancy having a go at doing a commercial feature film?(2) The downtown area is zoned for commercial use.(3) They were much more realistic about its long term commercial prospects.(4) The Dole commercial is the first time Pfizer has promoted Viagra through television.(5) A good commercial puts across the attractive features of a product.
(1) 对制作商业的影片有没有兴趣?(2) 市中心被划出供商业用。(3) 他们对它的长远商业前景更为现实。(4) 多尔的广告是辉瑞首次通过电视推销伟哥。(5) 好广告能突显产品吸引人的特徵。

Commercial is an adjective describing something with money-making and marketing intentions. If you’re a bit of a book snob, steer clear of commercial fiction, which is written for the widest enjoyment.

The adjective commercial first appeared in the 1680’s, long before television commercials, which is probably what you think of when you hear the word. An al was added to commerce, and it meant "pertaining to trade." It wasn’t until the 1870's that commercial meant “done for the sake of financial profit,” and then later in the 1930's, the noun form was refined to describe “an advertisement broadcast on radio or TV.”

1[ADJ 形容词]商业的；贸易的 Commercial means involving or relating to the buying and selling of goods.   [usu ADJ n]Docklands in its heyday was a major centre of industrial and commercial activity...港区在其最繁荣的时期曾是主要的工商业活动中心。Attacks were reported on police, vehicles and commercial premises.据报道，警察、车辆和商业经营场所均遭到袭击。2[ADJ-GRADED 能被表示程度的副词或介词词组修饰的形容词](组织、活动)营利的，商业化的，偏重利润的 Commercial organizations and activities are concerned with making money or profits, rather than, for example, with scientific research or providing a public service. British Rail has indeed become more commercial over the past decade...过去10年来，英国铁路确实变得更加商业化了。Conservationists in Chile are concerned over the effect of commercial exploitation of forests...对森林的商业开发所带来的影响让智利的自然资源保护者们感到忧心忡忡。Whether the project will be a commercial success is still uncertain.这个项目是否赚钱还是个未知数。commerciallyBritish Aerospace reckon that the plane will be commercially viable if 400 can be sold...英国航空航天公司估计这个型号的飞机如果能卖出400架，就可实现盈利。Insulin is produced commercially from animals...为获利从动物体内提取胰岛素。Designers are becoming more commercially minded.设计者们变得更有商业意识。3[ADJ 形容词](产品)商品化的，供市场出售的 A commercial product is made to be sold to the public.   [ADJ n]They are the leading manufacturer in both defence and commercial products.在军工产品和民用产品的制造方面，他们都处于领先地位。commerciallyIt was the first commercially available machine to employ artificial intelligence.这是第一台作为商品出售的采用人工智能技术的机器。4[ADJ 形容词](车辆)商用的 A commercial vehicle is a vehicle used for carrying goods, or passengers who pay.   [usu ADJ n]Commercial vehicles, coaches and lorries are required by law to be fitted with tachographs.法律规定商用车辆、长途汽车和卡车要安装转速计。...the fastest crossing of the Atlantic by a commercial passenger vessel.商用客船最快的一次横渡大西洋5[ADJ 形容词](电视、广播)靠广告收入维持的，商业性的 Commercial television and radio are paid for by the broadcasting of advertisements, rather than by the government.   [usu ADJ n]...Classic FM, the first national commercial radio station.国内首家商业广播电台——经典调频6[ADJ-GRADED 能被表示程度的副词或介词词组修饰的形容词](电影或音乐)商业化的，迎合大众口味的 Commercial is used to describe something such as a film or a type of music that it is intended to be popular with the public, and is not very original or of high quality. There's a feeling among a lot of people that music has become too commercial.很多人都觉得音乐变得过于商业化了。7[N-COUNT 可数名词](电视或电台的)商业广告 A commercial is an advertisement that is broadcast on television or radio. The government has launched a campaign of television commercials and leaflets.政府通过电视广告和传单的形式发起了宣传活动。

translation: n.盒式磁带；暗盒
examples: (1) Cassette tape recorders are gradually out of date now.(2) He bought a new cassette recorder.(3) There is a little window in the cassette case so that you can see the tape.(4) I rewound the cassette and played her voice back to her.
(1) 现在,盒式磁带录音机渐渐过时了。(2) 他买了一台新的盒式录音机。(3) 盒式音像带上有个小窗，能看见里面的磁带。(4) 我把录音带转回去，把她的声音放给她听。
A cassette is an audiotape, for recording or listening to sound. Before CDs were invented in the 1980s, many people bought their favorite music albums on cassettes.

You can use the word cassette to mean an audio or a videotape, though it's more commonly used for something you listen to. To use a cassette, you need a tape player or recorder. Cassette means "little box" in French, and this describes the way it looks, like a small plastic box. The modern meaning came about in 1960.

1[N-COUNT 可数名词](盒式)磁带，录像带 A cassette is a small, flat, rectangular plastic case containing magnetic tape which is used for recording and playing back sound or film.   [also on N]His two albums released on cassette have sold more than 10 million copies.他的两张专辑的磁带销量突破了1,000万。2[N-COUNT 可数名词](胶卷)暗盒；底片盒 A cassette is the container or case for the film that you load into a camera.

translation: n. 卷心菜，甘蓝菜，洋白菜；（俚)脑袋；（非正式、侮辱）植物人（常用于英式英语）；（俚）钱，尤指纸币（常用于美式俚语）
examples: He is busy pricking out some cabbage seedlings.Cabbage could be eaten raw in salads.I like to cook dishes with cabbage.The cabbage germinated within a week.Best buy of the week are carrot and cabbage, which are plentiful and cheap.

examples: The old man wants to buy a cage for birds.Is it cruel to confine a bird in a cage?The hamster had got through the wire at the front of its cage.The canary was trilling away in its cage.The lion paced the floor of his cage restlessly.Criminals are kept in the cages on this island.They placed a protective cage over the sapling.You can cage a bird, but you cannot make him sing.

examples: He passed me one fifth of the cake.I often bake chocolate cake by myself.

translation: vi. 呼叫；拜访；叫牌vt. 呼叫；称呼；召集n. 电话；呼叫；要求；访问n. (Call)人名；(瑞典、罗)卡尔；(英)考尔
examples: The shouting boy did not hear his mother call him.I'll call you if you give me a name card.Most people call me Bob. How do I address you?Shortly after we arrived at that hotel, we made a call back home.Tomorrow I'll pay a call on him.The President made a call for national unity.The call of this bird is very loud.Welcome every call as an opportunity, not an interruption.But God has shown me that I should not call any man impure or unclean.She called to her father for help.I'll certainly call on you if I come again.
大声叫嚷的孩子听不到妈妈的叫唤。给我一张名片吧,我会打电话给你。大家叫我鲍勃,我怎么称呼你?我们到达旅馆不久,就马上打电话回家。明天我将要去拜访他。总统号召全国人民团结起来。这只鸟的叫声很响亮。把每次来电看作一次机会，而非打扰。但神已经指示我，无论什么人，都不可看作俗而不洁净的。她向她父亲喊叫求救。再来的话,一定去拜访你。

examples: He was afflicted with cancer.The patient finally died from cancer.He's got a cancer in his liver.The oncologist invented a new kind of interferon to prevent cancer.It was a cancer for permanency and pain.The doping is a cancer of the pure Olympic Games.I'm a Cancer and my brother is a Leo.Cancer knits sweaters and makes fudge for the neighborhood.
他患了癌症。那位病人最终死于癌症。他得了肝癌。那位肿瘤学家发明了一种可以预防癌症的干扰素。那简直是一颗永远折磨人的毒瘤。兴奋剂是纯洁的奥运会的毒瘤。我是巨蟹座，弟弟是狮子座。巨蟹座会为邻居织毛衣或者自制巧克力。

translation: n. 蜡烛；烛光；烛形物vt. 对着光检查
examples: He put the candle on the silver candlestick.The candle was blown out by the wind.A solitary candle lightened the darkness of the room.She is pretty good, but she can't hold a candle to her mother.These discoveries are not worth the candle.If you go on burning the candle at both ends, you will be ill.To make sure that the eggs are fresh, we had better candle them one by one.
他把蜡烛放在银烛台上。蜡烛被风吹灭了。一支孤烛使黑暗的房间亮了起来。她相当不错，但还不能与他母亲相比。这些发现毫无价值。你如果再这样起早贪黑地干活，你会病倒的。为了查明鸡蛋是否新鲜，我们最好将鸡蛋一一对着光检查一遍。

translation: n. 盖；帽子vi. 脱帽致意vt. 覆盖；胜过；给…戴帽；加盖于n. (Cap)人名；(法、德、罗)卡普；(塞、捷)察普
examples: He took off his cap.It's better to put the cap back on the bottle.The government should impose an cap across the gas price.That's a good joke but I think I can cap it.Don't forget to cap the tank after filling it up with petrol.Only when the mountaineers got near to the top, they found that snow had capped the mountains.This speech caps a month of canvassing.They cap when they pass the president.
他摘掉帽子。最好把瓶盖盖上。政府应当给燃气价格强制规定上限。那是个好笑话，但是我可以说得更好。灌满汽油后别忘了把油箱盖上。登山队员们接近山顶时才发现大雪覆盖着山顶。这场演讲结束了一个月来的游说。他们经过院长面前时脱帽行礼。

translation: n. 首都，省会；资金；大写字母；资本家adj. 首都的；重要的；大写的n. (Capital)人名；(法)卡皮塔尔
examples: Beijing is the capital of China.All the government offices are in the capital.The main impediment to growth is a lack of capital.In this essay, some punctuations and capitals have been left out.Capital and output ratios, especially in those industries which imports technologies, tend to decline.Telegrams are usually typed out in capital letters.That's really a capital idea!"Dapi" meant "capital punishment" in ancient China.You shouldn't have made such a capital blunder.He was sentenced to capital punishment because of murder.
北京是中国的首都。所有的政府机关都在首都。影响发展的主要障碍是缺乏资本。在这篇文章里,一些标点和大写字母已经不在了。资本与产出的比率,尤其是在引进技术的企业中呈下降趋势!电报通常都用大写字母打出。那真是个绝妙的想法！一个头等重要的决定呼之欲出。你真不该犯这么严重的错误。他因杀人而被处以极刑。

translation: n. 队长，首领；船长；上尉；海军上校vt. 指挥；率领
examples: And they'll find that their bold captain is nowhere to be foundThe captain led our team to victory.The football captain was the mogul of the school.The captain bawled out an order to his soldiers.The captain of the sinking ship used flares to attract the attention of the coastguard.The sailors are asked to take their positions by their captain.The captain described the accident in the ship's log.Strong leadership is needed to captain the team.Who will captain the team?
但他们再也找不到他们豪勇的首领了。队长带领我们队取得了胜利。那足球队长是该校的大人物。队长向士兵们大声发出命令。轮船正在下沉，船长向海岸巡逻队发出闪光信号求救。船长要求水手们各就各位。船长在航海日志中描述了这次事故。担任这个队的队长需要强有力的领导才能。谁率领这支球队？

translation: n. 汽车；车厢n. (Car)人名；(土)贾尔；(法、西)卡尔；(塞)察尔
examples: A new type of car is on the market now.Repairing your car will cost a minimum of 100 dollars.The car in front of me stopped suddenly and I had to brake.This car has just been cut out from the train.Are you in a soft berth car or a hard berth car?

translation: n. 卡片；纸牌；明信片vt. 记于卡片上n. (Card)人名；(英)卡德
examples: They play cards every Friday.No one understood how I did the card trick.I have received eleven Christmas cards by now.He listed all the members' names on the card.Will you take my card and ask if he can see me?Here is my business card and my address is on it.Bertie's quite a card.You can brush with a card.

translation: n. 关怀；照料；谨慎；忧虑vi. 照顾；关心；喜爱；顾虑vt. 在意；希望或喜欢n. (Care)人名；(英)凯尔；(塞)察蕾
examples: It makes me feel good that you care about me.She will care for the children while I am away.He doesn't care for fish.I don't care whether or not she will attend the meeting.Would you care for another help?Would you care to have a small wager on the game?The students don't care how much you know until they know how much you care.Owing to wet weather, motorists are advised to drive with extra care.John's old enough to take care of himself.He leads a life free from care.If you decide to do this, you need to take care of several things.This patient requires intensive care.
你关心我,我感到很高兴。我不在的时候,她会照顾那些孩子。他不喜欢吃鱼。她是否来参加会议,我不介意。你还想得到帮助吗？你愿意在这场比赛上下个小赌注吗？学生不在乎你懂多少,而是在乎你对他们有多在意。雨天路滑,请格外小心驾驶。约翰长大了,能照顾自己了。他过着无忧无虑的生活。如果你决定要这样做,你必须注意几个方面。该病人需要加强护理。

translation: adj. 仔细的，小心的

他说话谨慎。与这种人打交道要小心谨慎。你花钱要慎重一些。经过慎重的考虑，我们决定接受他们的提议。他十分讲究外表。那个生病的男孩经过精心护理已经康复了。她的精心化妆掩饰了脂粉下面岁月刻下的痕迹。

translation: n. 胡萝卜诱饵
examples: Have some more carrot.The dish of boiled beef and carrot tastes good.You should eat such vegetables as carrot, celery and spinach.The myth that eating carrot improved your eyesight was exploded years ago.

translation: vt. 拿，扛；携带；支持；搬运vi. 能达到；被携带；被搬运n. 运载；[计] 进位；射程n. (Carry)人名；(英)卡里
examples: She came in carrying an important-looking piece of paper.This is a dangerous area, so don't carry too much cash on you.Pipes carry oil across the desert to the east.The box is so heavy that I can't carry it.His voice carries the ring of authority.Many dangerous diseases are carried by insects.This radio station does not carry any advertising.Crimes of violence carry heavy penalties.
她进来时,拿着一份看来很重要的文件。这个地区很危险，所以你身上不要带太多现金。输油管把石油经过沙漠运送到东部。箱子太重了,我搬不动。他的声音中带有权威的口气。许多危险的疾病是由昆虫传播的。这家广播电台不播送任何广告。暴力罪行要承受严厉的惩罚。

translation: n. 猫，猫科动物
examples: A cat mews.The cat lapped up the milk.The cat is playing with a live mouse.The tiger is a representative of the cat family.Don't listen to her gossip; she is a cat.He supported a flogging with the cat as punishment.
猫喵喵叫。猫舔食牛奶。猫在戏弄那只活老鼠。老虎是猫科动物的典型。别听她搬弄是非，她是个心地恶毒的女人。他忍受了一场九尾鞭的狠狠鞭打，以示惩戒。

translation: vt. 赶上；抓住；感染；了解vi. 赶上；抓住n. 捕捉；捕获物；窗钩
examples: We're just in time to catch the train.The police are tracking down him and hope to catch him soon.It is natural for a cat to catch mice.I don't catch your meaning.That's a nice catch.The fisherman had a good catch.There must be a catch to that last question.
我们正好赶上了火车。警察正在搜捕他并希望能很快抓住他。猫捉老鼠是本能。我不明白你的意思。那球接得好。渔夫捕到许多鱼。最後那个问题里面一定有圈套。

translation: n. 原因；事业；目标vt. 引起；使遭受
examples: Smoking can cause lung cancer.She is always causing trouble for people.Police are investigating the causes of the explosion.You have no cause for complaint.World peace is a cause we should all work for.She is willing to donate money to a worthy cause.
吸烟可致肺癌。她总是给人添麻烦。警方正在调查爆炸的原因。你没有理由抱怨。争取世界和平是一项我们都应该为之而努力的事业。她愿为高尚的事业捐款。

translation: abbr. 光盘，激光唱片（Compact Disc）；呼叫设备（Calling Device）；中央地区（Central District）；商务部（Commerce Department）
examples: The lines AB and CD intersect at E.The line AB intersects the line CD at E.AB and CD intersect at (the point) P.
直线AB与直线CD相交於E点。直线AB与直线CD相交於E点。AB线和CD线在P点相交。

translation: 光盘只读存储器；只读型光盘
examples: I need three CD ROM drives for pcs.The folks at Archimedes initially built their stuff for CD ROM.The imaging file and index were established and saved by writeable CD ROM.It was really this last Christmas that most of the machines had the CD ROM drive in it.New books and CD ROM that document his political life and contributions to democracy were introduced.No version of Windows will function from the CD ROM as it is a read-only device.
我需要三张个人电脑的光驱。? 阿基米得人起初针对CD-ROM构建他们的素材资料。 采集、处理压缩图像 ,建立文件 ,并将图像文件通过可写光驱存入光盘 ,同时编写文件索引。 它真的是大部份机器在它里面有激光唱碟ROM推进力的这个最后的圣诞节。 除了纪念恪有发表新册及电脑光碟介绍信介仙政治耶一生及对民主耶贡献。 没有可以从CD ROM引导的Windows版本,因为它是只读设备。

translation: n. 分；一分的硬币；森特（等于半音程的百分之一）n. (Cent)人名；(法)桑
examples: I'm a hundred per cent certain.I don't have a cent with me.The coins of the lowest denomination is the cent.
我百分之百地肯定。我身上一分钱也没有。钱币的最低单位是分。

translation: vi. 以…为中心vt. 集中；将…放在中央n. 中心adj. 中央的
examples: That new shopping centre is a real eyesore.The new library was built in the centre of the campus.Children like to be the centre of attention.Please centre the subheads.All our hopes centre on you now.Our thoughts centre upon one idea.Our thoughts centre upon this important problem.Pupils are the centre parts of one's eyes.The building stands cheek by jowl with the centre square.Only centre government has the power to mobilize the country's economic resources.
那个新的购物中心真是难看极了。新图书馆建在校园的中心。儿童喜欢引人注意.小标题一律居中。我们的一切希望都集中在你身上。我们的思想集中在一个主意上。我们的思想集中在这个重要问题上。瞳孔是人眼的中心部位。这幢建筑坐落在紧紧靠着中心广场的地方。只有中央政府才有权力调动国家的经济资源。

translation: n. 世纪，百年；（板球）一百分
examples: This book was written centuries ago.Many centuries have passed since that time.He flourished in the early 18th century.The palace was built in the fifteenth century.It was considered as the best novel of the century.
这本书是几百年前写的。从那时起，几百年过去了。他在18世纪早期享有盛名。这宫殿建于十五世纪。这本书是那个世纪最好的一部小说。

translation: adv. 当然；行（用于回答）；必定
examples: You are certainly a talented artist.I'll certainly be most discreet in my conversation.He will certainly come.He'll certainly die if you do not send for a doctor right now.
你当然是位有天赋的艺术家。我在谈话中当然会十分小心的。他一定会来的。如果你不马上请医生,他一定会死的。

translation: n. 椅子；讲座；（会议的）主席位；大学教授的职位vt. 担任（会议的）主席；使…入座；使就任要职n. (Chair)人名；(法)谢尔
examples: Her hands rested on the arms of her chair.He sat in a chair near the door.Mr Smith will take the chair at the next meeting.He was elected chair of the city council.I'd like you to chair the meeting.The teacher appointed her to chair the class meeting.Take the chair for the papers by Cunin and Cronan.She takes the chair in all our meetings.
她的双手搁在椅子的扶手上。他坐在靠门的一把椅子上。下次会议将由史密斯先生主持。他当选为市议会主席。我想请你主持会议。老师指定她主持班务会。担任库宁和克罗兰等论文讨论会的主席。她担任我们一切会议的主席。

translation: n. 挑战；怀疑vt. 向…挑战；对…质疑
examples: The crossing of this dangerous river was a challenge to most of us.He accepted his friend's challenge to swim across the river.We accepted their challenge to a baseball game.He ignored the sentry's challenge to halt.Their legal challenge was unsuccessful.Nowadays no one will challenge the fact that the earth is round.New competitors are emerging to challenge the old economic arrangements.The sentry challenged the stranger at the gates.I did not think he was right, so I challenged him.
对我们大多数人来说,横渡这条充满危险的大河确实是个挑战。他接受朋友提出的挑战，游过这条河。我们接受了他们棒球邀请的挑战。他不理睬哨兵喝令止步的盘问。他们的法律质疑未获成功。现在没有人会对地球是圆的这一事实提出异议。新的竞争对手正在崛起，向旧的经济布局挑战。哨兵查问在门口的陌生人。我认为他是不对的，因此向他提出质询。

translation: n. 机会，际遇；运气，侥幸；可能性vt. 偶然发生；冒……的险vi. 碰巧；偶然被发现n. (Chance)人名；(英)钱斯
examples: That would be a daunting task with little chance of success.Is there any chance of getting tickets for tonight's performance?Please give me a chance to explain.I never miss a chance of playing football.We may lose a lot of support, but that's a chance we'll have to take.I met her quite by chance.A chance meeting brought the two old friends together again.If it should chance to rain we'll take a taxi home.Perhaps you might chance on the dictionary at some old bookstall.We were very lucky to chance on him in the reading room.It may be risky but we will chance it anyhow.We'll have to chance meeting an enemy patrol.

那样做的话任务过于艰巨,且成功的可能性微乎其微。有可能得到今晚演出的票吗?请给我个机会让我解释一下。我从不错过踢足球的机会。我们或许会失去很多支持，但这个风险我们必须冒一冒。我遇见她完全是偶然的。偶然的相遇使两位老朋友重新聚首。万一要下雨的话，我们就乘出租车回家。或许你会碰巧在旧书摊上买到这本辞典。我们非常幸运地在阅览室里遇到了他。这可能有危险, 但我们无论如何要冒一冒险。我们不得不冒著可能遇上敌人巡逻兵的危险。

translation: vt. 改变；交换n. 变化；找回的零钱vi. 改变；兑换
examples: His perception of the change came in a flash.The change in the weather has mucked up our sports timetable.This is a tremendous change unparalleled in the history of China and of the world.The little boy reached in his pocket and pulled out some change.Can you break this one hundred dollar bill and give me some change?Please telephone me if you are to change the day of our meeting.She had to change her way of life when her baby came on the scene.It is very serious and important, Why do you change horses in midstream.All our previous ideas are now in the melting-pot; our jobs are bound to change radically.If she has once set her face against a thing, nothing will persuade her to change her mind.

他在一瞬间察觉到了这一变化。天气的变化打乱了我们运动比赛的日程。这是一个绝大的变化，这是自有世界历史和中国历史以来无可比拟的大变化。小男孩把手伸进口袋，掏出了一些零钱。你可以帮我把一百块换成零钱吗?如果你不得不改变我们会晤的日期，请给我打个电话。她的孩子出世之后，她不得不改变生活方式。这是十分严肃而又重要的事。你为什么中途改变计划了？我们从前的一切观念都正在改变，我们的工作肯定要有很大变动。她要是一旦不赞同某事,那就怎么也没法劝她改变主意了。

translation: n. 图表；海图；图纸；排行榜vt. 绘制…的图表；在海图上标出；详细计划；记录；记述；跟踪（进展或发展n. (Chart)人名；(泰)察
examples: Can you read the weather chart?They laid out the chart of their destiny to come.Joyride topped the US chart in spring 1991.On the map we chart the course of the river.They tried to chart the sea area between Norway and Denmark.They have already begun charting the course for next campaign.
你能看懂气象图吗？他们展开了他们未来命运的蓝图。专辑《逍遥游》于1991年春荣登美国排行榜榜首。我们在地图上标出了该河的流向。他们企图绘制挪威与丹麦之间的海域图。他们已经开始为下次活动规划进程了。

translation: adj. 便宜的；小气的；不值钱的adv. 便宜地
examples: Her shoes look cheap.I am going to buy something cheap.A flood of cheap imports has come into the shops.These are cheap and gaudy clothes.This photograph is taken with a cheap camera.
她的那双鞋看上去很便宜。我要买些便宜的东西。大量廉价进口商品涌入商店。这是些廉价而花哨的衣服。这张照片是用一架廉价照相机拍摄的。

translation: vt. 检查，核对；制止，抑制；在…上打勾vi. 核实，查核；中止；打勾；[象棋]将一军n. 支票；制止，抑制；检验，核对n. （英）切克（人名）
examples: Do look out for spelling mistakes when you check your homework.We had to check this tendency for administrative reasons.Please check the date.We conduct regular check on the quality of our products.Heavy rains were a check on the army's advance.Can you cash me the check?Would you please bring us our check?She is wearing a check skirt.The young Muscovite must have overlooked this intermediate check.The king does not move to a square that is attacked by an enemy piece during the castling move, i.e., you may not castle and end the move with the king in check.
你检查作业时要当心拼写错误。由于市政管理的原因，我们不得不阻止这种趋势。请核实一下日期。我们对产品做例行质量检查。大雨阻挡了军队的前进你能把这张支票给我兑换成现金吗?请给我们账单。她穿着一条格子短裙。年轻的莫斯科人一定没注意到这步将军。国王在王车易位中移动到一个被敌方的棋子攻击的方块，例如在王车易位时，你不能移动使得国王处于被将军地位。

translation: n. [食品] 奶酪；干酪；要人vt. 停止adj. 叛变的；胆小的
examples: This cheese is rather bland.The cheese was emitting a strong smell.Just have a taste of this cheese!Cheese often upsets her stomach.There are many kinds of cheese.We had a homely meal of bread and cheese.I had a frugal meal of bread and cheese last night.Cheese it, or you'll have the ceiling down.
这干酪没什么味道。干酪散发出强烈的气味。尝一点儿这种乳酪吧！她吃乳酪後常常感到肠胃不适。奶酪有许多种。我们吃了一顿面包加乳酪的家常便餐。我昨晚吃了只有面包和奶酪的便餐。别吵了，否则天花板就要给你们吵下来了。

translation: n. 化学；化学过程
examples: I prefer chemistry to physics.We have three periods of chemistry a week.No one can cope with him in Chemistry.We will do a Chemistry experiment this Friday.I am not good at organic chemistry.
我喜欢化学甚于物理。我们一星期三节化学课。在化学方面，谁也比不上他。这个周五我们要做化学试验。我的有机化学学得不好。

translation: n. 国际象棋，西洋棋n. (Chess)人名；(英)切斯
examples: My win at chess raised my spirits a little.I'm not very fond of playing chess.It was the first time I'd won since I'd learnt to play chess.Chess is his favorite diversion.He will take part in a chess tournament next week.I like to play chess with my father.Chess is played by two people.
我赢了这盘国际象棋才打起了一点精神。我不太喜欢下棋。自从我学会下国际象棋以来，这是我第一次赢。象棋是他最喜欢的娱乐活动。下星期，他将要参加一场国际象棋比赛。我喜欢和爸爸一起下国际象棋。国际象棋是两个人玩的。

translation: n. 鸡肉；小鸡；胆小鬼，懦夫adj. 鸡肉的；胆怯的；幼小的
examples: He has a chicken farm.He is mending the wire mesh in front of the chicken coop.This soup tastes of chicken.There was fried chicken for dinner.Don't be a chicken.I was terrified, but I didn't want the others to think I was chicken.They thought I was chicken when I refused to go with them.The boy chickened out of climbing up the tree.I wanted to tell the boss what I thought, but I chickened out at the last minute.
他有一个养鸡场。他正在鸡笼前面修理铁丝网。这汤里有鸡肉的味道。有炸鸡肉作晚餐。不要害怕。我很害怕,但是我不想其他人认为我很怯懦。当我拒绝跟他们走时,他们以为我胆怯了。男孩胆怯了,不敢爬上这棵树。我本想把自己的想法告诉老板,但最后还是没敢说。

translation: n. 儿童，小孩，孩子；产物；子孙；幼稚的人；弟子n. （英）蔡尔德（人名）
examples: He's still but a child.He tutored the child in physics.They cherished the child as one of their own.Every child bares the responsibility and obligation of supporting the old.He was a child of the Renaissance.Disease is the child of intemperance.
他仅仅是个小孩子。他给这小孩辅导物理。他们把这孩子当作自己亲生子女一般。每位子女都负有赡养老人的责任和义务。他是文艺复兴时期的产物。疾病是无节制的产物。

translation: n. 烟囱
examples: The explosion toppled the old chimney.The chimney is almost choked up with soot.The smoke from chimney is spreading out in the sky.I can hear a bird fluttering in the chimney.The chimney exhales a thick smoke.
这次爆炸把那个旧烟囱给炸倒了。烟囱几乎被烟垢堵住了。烟囱冒出的烟正在空中散开。我听见一只鸟在烟囱里扑扑地拍翅。这个烟囱冒出一股浓烟。

translation: n. 中国adj. 中国的；中国制造的n. china，瓷器adj. china，瓷制的
examples: Beijing is the capital of China.China does a lot of trade with many countries.China is an oriental country with a long history.All our glass and china is kept in the cupboard.I've just dropped one of your china ornamental.
北京是中国的首都。中国和许多国家进行多方面贸易。中国是一个有着悠久历史的东方国家。我们所有的玻璃和陶瓷器皿都放在柜橱里。我刚才把你的一个瓷器装饰品弄掉了。

translation: n. 中文，汉语；中国人adj. 中国的，中国人的；中国话的
examples: The Chinese eat with chopsticks.Remember you are a Chinese wherever you go.My native language is Chinese.The Chinese palace lanterns are famous for their delicacy.Chinese people are working hard to make the country richer and more beautiful.Something important has vanished from Chinese life.He speaks English with a Chinese accent.This is the oldest Chinese manuscript in existence.
中国人用筷子吃饭。不论你到哪里,记住你是中国人。我的母语是汉语。中国的宫灯以精巧闻名。中国人民正在努力工作，把国家建设得更加富饶美丽。有些重要的东西已经从中国人的生活中消失。他讲英语带有汉语口音。这是现存最早的汉语手稿。

translation: n. [食品] 炸土豆条；小木片；（作赌注用的）圆形筹码；缺口（chip的复数形式）
examples: Chisel Thruster with vibra force chips away at tough obstructions while flushing away debris.Charlie cashed in his chips and left.Enter the amount of Free Play chips you wish to play with.
硬的堵塞物削成碎片，并将碎屑冲刷掉。查利交进筹码兑换了现金而离去。输入您希望游玩的免费筹码的金额。

translation: n. 巧克力，巧克力糖；巧克力色adj. 巧克力色的；巧克力口味的n. (Chocolate)人名；(葡)绍科拉特
examples: Never eat chocolate before dinner.Would you like a cup of chocolate?The boy spent 10 pennies on chocolate.She dealt out a bar of chocolate to each child.A lightly roasted bean may range in color from cinnamon to a light chocolate tan.We soon despatched the chocolate cake.Years ago, I promised myself that when I retired I would get a chocolate poodle to share my golden years.
饭前不要吃巧克力。你想要杯巧克力饮料吗？这男孩花了10便士买巧克力糖。她分给每个孩子一块巧克力糖。轻度烘焙的咖啡豆颜色是介于肉桂色与浅巧克力色之间。我们很快就吃完了巧克力蛋糕。多年前，我就决意，退休时要找条巧克力色的 我共度美好的晚年。

translation: vt. 选择，决定vi. 选择，挑选
examples: It's up to you to choose where we should go.He will choose banking as his career.He chose not to go home until later.
我们要去的地点,由你负责选择。他将选择银行业做为职业。他决定晚一点才回家。

translation: n. 筷子
examples: She is still awkward with chopsticks.I have trouble using chopsticks correctly.
她用筷子还不熟练。我很难正确地使用筷子。

translation: n. 教堂；礼拜；教派adj. 教会的；礼拜的vt. 领…到教堂接受宗教仪式n. (Church)人名；(英)丘奇
examples: Church begins at 9 o' clock.Christians go to church on Sundays.Everyone in church knelt in prayer.I'm just going to the church to see the priest.The Church has a duty to condemn violence.She loves church music.
礼拜仪式9点开始。基督教徒每个星期日到教堂去做礼拜。教堂里每个人都跪着祈祷。我正要去教堂去见见牧师。基督徒有责任谴责暴力。她喜爱教堂音乐。

translation: n. 电影；电影院；电影业，电影制作术n. (Cinema)人名；(意)奇内马
examples: They streamed out of the cinema.There is a telephone booth near the cinema.He has an urge to become a cinema star.When going to the cinema we prefer Czech films and the country has a great tradition for film-making.
他们涌出电影院。电影院附近有一个电话亭。他渴望当一名电影明星。去电影院时，我们更偏爱捷克电影，这个国家有了不起的电影拍摄传统。

translation: n. 循环，周期；圆；圈子；圆形物vi. 盘旋，旋转；环行vt. 画圆圈；环绕…移动
examples: The dancers were standing in a circle around the fire.A square has four sides but a circle has no sides.He has a large circle of friends.He is part of an exclusive social circle and belongs to an exclusive club.We've booked seats in the circle.Someone had circled the next paragraph in red.Our army circled the desperate enemy and wiped them out in a second.The plane circled the airport before landing.The moon circles the earth every 28 days.
舞者们围着篝火站成一圈。正方形有四条边，而圆形没有边。他有一大群朋友。他所处的社交圈子很排外，而且参加的又是个很排外的社团。我们预订了楼厅包厢的座位。有人将下一段划了一个红圈。我们的军队包围了垂死挣扎的敌人,并很快地将其一举歼灭。飞机在着陆之前在机场上空盘旋。月亮每28天绕地球旋转一周。

translation: n. 城市，都市adj. 城市的；都会的
examples: Beijing is a large city.I live in the west of the city.The city is held by the enemy.He said he preferred country life to city life.The pressures of city life forced him to move to the country.The city turned out to welcome back its victorious team.She works in the City.
北京是一座大城市。我住在该城市的西部。这座城市已被敌人占领。他说他喜欢乡下生活，而不喜欢都市生活。都市生活的艰难迫使他迁往乡村。全市居民倾城而出迎接凯旋球队。她在伦敦商业区工作。

translation: n. 阶级；班级；种类；班；等级vt. 分类；把…分等级；把…归入某等级，把…看作（或分类、归类）；把…编入某一班级adj. 极好的；很好的，优秀的，出色的vi. 属于…类（或等级），被列为某类（或某级）n. （英、德）克拉斯（人名）
examples: I wouldn't put him in the same class as Verdi.All of us are working class.They are the leading class in our country.We were both in the same class.He took the ninth position in his class of forty.My violin class starts at 4:30 every day.Tom came to school late and missed the first class.Like the dahlia, the cornflower Centaurea cyanus belongs to class 19.His performance showed enormous class.Immigrant workers were classed as resident aliens.
我没把他看作是与维迪一个级别的。我们都是工人阶级。在我们国家,他们是领导阶级。那时我们在同一个班。他在40 个人的班级里排在第九名。我的小提琴课每天四点半开始。汤姆迟到且没有上到第一堂课。与大丽花一样,矢车菊也同属19纲。他的表现显示出极好的风度。移民来的工人已归入外侨类。

translation: n. 同班同学
examples: He is my classmate of junior middle school.He helped a classmate who was behind with his homework.
他是我初中时的同班同学。他帮助一位没有按时完成作业的同班同学。

translation: n. 教室
examples: The classroom was crammed with students.Teachers rule in classroom teaching.Don't confine your study only to the classroom.
教室里挤满了学生。在课堂教学中教师占主导地位。不要把自己的学习只局限于课堂。

translation: adj. 清洁的，干净的；清白的vt. 使干净vi. 打扫，清扫adv. 完全地n. 打扫n. (Clean)人名；(英)克林
examples: You must keep your clothes clean.I'll let you use my bike on condition that you keep it clean.Mickey is a clean mouse right from the beginning.President Bush writes a personal letter to Kim, in essence entreating him to come clean on his nuclear program so we can proceed to full normalization.We want you to be a good boy, and live a clean, righteous life.I clean forgot about it.The housewife always keeps the sink clean.Clean clothes and good manners are prepossessing.Please clean the window as I can hardly see out.The mayor is determined to clean up the city.
你必须保持衣着整洁。如果你能保持车子干净,我就让你用我的自行车。米老鼠从一开始就是一只纯洁的老鼠。布什总统给金正日写了一封私人信件，主要是要求他澄清核项目，这样我们可以和他们继续推进完全的正常化关系。我们希望你是个好孩子，过纯洁而正当的生活。我完全忘记了这件事。主妇总是保持水槽的清洁。清洁的衣服和良好的举止能给人以好感。请把窗子弄干净，我几乎看不到外面。市长决心清除市内的不良现象。

translation: n. [化工] 清洁剂；清洁工；干洗店；干洗商；洗洁器
examples: No, but we need a part-time cleaner.The cleaner dumped all the rubbish into a big bin.
没有，不过我们需要非全日工作的清洁工。清洁工把所有垃圾倒入一个大桶里。

translation: adj. 清楚的；清澈的；晴朗的；无罪的vt. 通过；清除；使干净；跳过vi. 放晴；变清澈adv. 清晰地；完全地n. 清除；空隙n. (Clear)人名；(英)克利尔
examples: I made it clear to him that I rejected his proposal.You are a boss, as is clear from your manner.There is a clear division of labor in ants.His height gives him a clear advantage.The guidance of clear aim and working hard can lead to success.I'm still not clear what the job involves.I am not clear about the reason why you want to go.The copy is blurred, it is not very clear.The water here is shallow and clear.Like the sky, I feel my heart is becoming clear.Stars are brilliant in the clear night sky.It is only at night when she lies in bed that she feels she has a clear mind.The ground should first be cleared of weeds.He cleared a space on his desk for a cup of coffee.If you don't want to see the introductory pages again after reading the introduction, you can clear the check box.In that case you'll have to clear yourself.As far as I can see, the weather is not likely to clear up within a few days.The government should clear up the question of responsibility.He tried hard to speak loud and clear on that occasion.She read the book clear to the end within two hours.

我清楚地告诉他，我拒绝了他的建议。你是一个老板,从你的举止就能很清楚地看出来。蚂蚁间有明确的分工。他的身高使他具有明显的优势。成功需要有明确的目标引导和辛勤的工作。我仍然不明白这项工作包括哪些内容。我不明白你为何要去的理由。这个复制件被弄模糊了,不太清晰。这里的水又浅又清。像这片天空一样,我感到我的心灵也澄清了。星星在晴朗的夜空闪亮。只是晚上躺在床上的时候,她才感到神志清醒。这块地上的杂草应该先除干净。他在书桌上腾出了一点儿地方用来放一杯咖啡。如果阅读简介之后不想再次查看引导页,可以清除该复选框。那样，你只得自行辩白了。据我看,几天内不大会放晴。公司应使责任问题明朗化。他竭力想让自己在这种场合说话响亮清楚些。她在两个小时里就把书从头到尾全读完了。

translation: adv. 清晰地；明显地；无疑地；明净地
examples: She can reason very clearly.He formulated his thought clearly.We can see the dust particles floating in the sunlight clearly.It's clearly a breach of contract.Phil is clearly unfit to hold a senior position.
她能很清晰地思考。他清楚确切地表达了自己的思想。我们可以很清楚地看到阳光下的灰尘颗粒。这显然是违反了合同。菲尔显然不能胜任高级职务。

translation: adj. 聪明的；机灵的；熟练的[ 比较级cleverer 最高级 cleverest ]
examples: It's a clever speech, but there was no real meat in it.He's so clever, he makes me feel inferior.Mr. Jones is a clever carpenter.He is clever at arithmetic.
这演说很动听，可是没什么内容。他那么聪明，让我自愧不如。琼斯先生是个巧木匠。他擅长算术。

translation: vt. 点击；使发咔哒声vi. 作咔哒声n. 单击；滴答声
examples: Marsha heard the lock click softly.Click on their names to find out more about them.You can click here to download the file now.The door clicked shut.Click on their names to find out more about them.
玛莎听到锁轻轻地发出咔嗒一声。点击它们的名称以获取更多信息。你可以点击这里立刻下载文件。门咔嗒一声关上了。点击它们的名称以获取更多信息。

translation: vi. 爬；攀登；上升vt. 爬；攀登；上升n. 爬；攀登
examples: I have some climbing plants in the garden.We go to climb mountains every Sunday.The road climbs steeply for several miles.The value of imports has climbed sharply in the last year.Do you think you can climb that steep cliff?Climb up the tree and chuck the apples down to me.There was a steep climb on the road out of town.
我的花园里长着一些攀缘植物。每个星期天我们都去爬山。这条路有几英里向上倾斜得很陡。去年进口货物的价值急剧上升。你以为你能爬上那座悬崖峭壁吗？爬到树上去把苹果给我扔下来。市外公路上有一处很陡的上坡路。

translation: n. 时钟；计时器vt. 记录；记时vi. 打卡；记录时间n. (Clock)人名；(英)克洛克
examples: The clock shows half past two.This clock has outlasted several owners.The silence was succeeded by the striking of a clock.There must be something wrong with my clock.Workers usually clock off at 5.30.I usually clock in at 8 o'clock.He clocked 9.8 seconds for the 100 metres.
时钟的针指著两点半。这座时钟的寿命比它的几个主人的寿命都长。时钟鸣响声打破了寂静。我的钟一定是坏了。工人们通常在5时30分下班。我通常8点钟签到。他100米跑了9.

translation: adj. 紧密的；亲密的；亲近的vt. 关；结束；使靠近vi. 关；结束；关闭adv. 紧密地n. 结束n. (Close)人名；(西)克洛塞；(英、法)克洛斯
examples: If you close your eyes, you can't see anything.The road was closed to traffic for two days.The hospital closed at the end of last year.He closed his speech with a funny joke.Shares leapt in value from 476p to close at 536p.These measures are aimed at closing the gap between the rich and the poor.She closed her hand over his.Management closed ranks and ostracized the troublemaker.Tim seemed to make up his mind to close with this proposal.I believe you and he were very close friends.The church is close to the school.They felt something close to despair.There is nothing for it but to keep her under close watch.This close italic print is very hard on the eyes.She kept close about the information and none found out.She's always been very close with her money.It was a close match. But you deserved to win, and you did.They live quite close.He came close but she drew back.The girl pressed close to her mother.He soon brought the meeting to a close.

如果你闭上眼睛，就什么也看不见了。这条路已经封路两天了。这所医院去年年底关闭。他用一则有趣的笑话结束了演讲。股价从476便士猛涨到收盘536便士。这些措施旨在缩小贫富差距。她牢牢抓住他的手不放。管理员使队伍靠拢，将捣乱者清除出去提姆看上去已经下定决心同意这项提议。我相信你和他是亲密无间的朋友。教堂在学校附近。他们几乎有一种绝望的感觉。没有任何别的办法,只好把她置于严密的监视之下。看这种排得很紧的斜体字，很伤人的眼睛。她对这个信息守口如瓶，没有人发现。她用钱总是很吝啬。这是一场势均力敌的比赛，不过你应该赢，而你确实也赢了。他们住得很近.他一步步靠近，而她却一步步向后退。小女孩紧紧地挤在母亲身边。他很快就结束了会见。

translation: n. 衣服
examples: She has good taste in clothes.It might be appropriate to wear traditional clothes on special occasions.I washed many clothes with my washer last night.Plain, simple clothes are appropriate for school wear.
她对服装有很好的审美眼光。在某些特定的场合,我们适合穿传统服装。我昨晚用洗衣机洗了很多衣服。简单朴素的衣服适合在学校里穿。

translation: n. 云；阴云；云状物；一大群；黑斑vt. 使混乱；以云遮敝；使忧郁；玷污vi. 阴沉；乌云密布n. (Cloud)人名；(法)克卢；(英)克劳德
examples: A cloud is a mass of vapor in the sky.When there are black clouds you can tell it's going to rain.His sudden departure cast a cloud upon our scheme.The sad news of her father's death was the only cloud on an otherwise happy year.
云是天空中的水汽团。有乌云的时候，就知道快下雨了。他的突然离去给我们的计划投下一层阴影。她父亲的死讯是她愉快的一年中唯一伤心的事。

translation: adj. 多云的；阴天的；愁容满面的
examples: Tonight will be cloudy.In that cloudy sky only one lone star can be seen.It's cloudy today.A drop of milk diffused in the water, and it became cloudy.His judgment can sometimes be a little cloudy.
今天夜间多云。在那多云的天上，只能看到孤零零的一颗星星。今天阴天。一滴奶在水中扩散开来，使水变得混浊不清了。他的判断可能有时会有些模糊不清。

translation: n. 俱乐部，社团；夜总会；棍棒；（扑克牌中的）梅花vt. 用棍棒打；募集vi. 集资；组成俱乐部adj. 俱乐部的n. (Club)人名；(英)克拉布
examples: The tennis club has organized a dance.He is an active member of the school's stamp club.I was a slave under club and fist.You can see the king of club is the winning play.He was clubbed to death with a butt of a gun.We clubbed together to buy our teacher a present.
网球俱乐部组织了一次舞会。他是学校集邮俱乐部的一名活跃会员。在他们的棍棒和拳脚下，我就是一个奴隶。你可以看出来打梅花K是赢牌的一招。他是被人用枪托殴打致死的。我们凑钱给老师买了件礼物。

translation: n. 外套vt. 覆盖…的表面n. (Coat)人名；(法)科阿
examples: You may hang your coat on the hook.She was wearing a woolen coat, with a cotton blouse underneath.Jane bought a fur coat yesterday.One of the buttons has come off my coat.The wall needs a second coat of paint.Mountain goats have long shaggy coats.The bookshelves were coated with red paint.The table was coated in dust.
你可以把外套挂在钩子上。她外面穿了一件毛外套，里面穿一件棉布衬衫。简昨天买了一件裘皮大衣。我上衣上的一颗扣子掉了。那面墙需要再刷一层油漆。山羊的皮毛长且粗糙。书架上涂了一层红色的油漆。桌子上覆盖了一层灰尘。

translation: n. 咖啡；咖啡豆；咖啡色n. (Coffee)人名；(英)科菲
examples: He put some sugar into his coffee.Have some cream in your coffee.We had cookies and coffee.I prefer tea to coffee.Brazil exports a lot of coffee.She appeared at the door dressed in a coffee colored silk dressing gown.
他往咖啡里加了些糖。在你的咖啡里加点奶油吧。我们吃了甜饼和咖啡。我更喜欢茶，而不是咖啡。巴西出口大量咖啡。她穿了一件咖啡色的绸缎睡衣出现在门口。

translation: vt. 铸造（货币）；杜撰，创造n. 硬币，钱币n. (Coin)人名；(西、意)科因；(法)库安
examples: He put a coin into the insertion slot.He paid me in coin.Father dug up an old coin in the garden.They were granted the right to coin money.The government has decided to coin more one-yuan pieces.Who coined the word "quiz" ?We'd better not coin terms that are intelligible to nobody.The reverse of the coin was stamped with an eagle.Instead, acknowledge both sides of the coin.This is a coin washing machine.
他往投币孔投入一枚硬币。他付给我的都是硬币。父亲在花园里掘出一枚古钱币。他们获得铸造钱币的授权。政府决定再多铸造一些一元的硬币。谁创造的“quiz”这个词呀？我们最好不要生造谁也不懂的词语。硬币的反面压印的是一只鹰。认识到了硬币的两个面。这是一台投币式洗衣机。

translation: n. 焦炭；可卡因；可口可乐（Coca-Cola）vi. 焦化vt. 变成焦炭；用麻药使…麻醉
examples: Coke consists mainly of carbon.Without coke iron cannot be smelted.
焦炭的主要成分是碳。没有焦炭就不能炼铁。

translation: adj. 寒冷的；冷淡的，不热情的；失去知觉的n. 寒冷；感冒adv. 完全地
examples: We lunched out on cold meat and salad.It was bitterly cold that night.His cold manner holds people off.Our enthusiasm for the plan faded in the cold light of day and we realized how impractical it really was.The dampness is unpleasant,not to mention the cold.Put on your coat, or you may catch a cold.A good sweat often cures a cold.Get out of those wet clothes before you catch cold.John knew the business cold.The actor had his lines down cold.
我们午饭在外面吃的是凉肉和色拉。那个夜晚,天气十分寒冷。他的冷淡态度使人们不敢接近他。经过客观冷静的分析，我们对这个计划的热情消失了，因为我们认识到它实在不实际了。潮湿就令人不快,更不必说寒冷了。穿上你的外套,否则你会感冒的。好好发一次汗往往可以治愈伤风。把湿衣服脱掉，不然要伤风的。约翰对此事了如指掌。这演员把台词背得滚瓜烂熟了。

translation: vt. 收集；募捐vi. 收集；聚集；募捐adv. 由收件人付款地adj. 由收件人付款的n. (Collect)人名；(英)科莱克特
examples: He used to collect cards, but now he likes to collect stamps.A crowd soon collected at the scene of the accident.He's collecting (money) for famine relief.The dustmen collect the rubbish once a week.I tried to collect my thoughts but I was too excited.
他以前收集卡片,现在却喜欢收集邮票。群众迅速聚集在出事现场。他正在为赈济饥民募捐.垃圾工每周运走一次垃圾.我试图使思想集中起来，但是我太激动了。

translation: n. 大学；学院；学会
examples: He is studying in the theological college.He is at law college.He had passed the entrance examination of the college.Our daughter is going to college.She is a member of the Royal College of Nursing.
他在那所神学院学习。他在法学院读书。他已经通过了大学的入学考试。我们的女儿秋天就要上大学。她是皇家护士协会的会员。

translation: vt. 把…涂颜色，粉饰；歪曲；使脸红vi. 变色n. 颜色；风格；气色，面色；外貌
examples: She painted the window sills a bright colour.His dress is very similar to mine in colour.That colour doesn't suit your complexion.Colour is often an additive in foods.Either dye or paints are used to colour cloth.The printer will output colour graph.Children enjoy watching colour TV.The natives were intrigued with the colour of our skin.The wind of the autumn colour the maples carmine .He hashed a phrase in order to colour the sentence.News is often coloured.Don't allow personal loyalty to colour your judgement.A judge can't let personal feelings colour his decisions.The leaves start to colour in autumn.She coloured with embarrassment at his remarks.
她把窗台漆上鲜艳的颜色。他衣服的颜色和我衣服的很相似。那颜色不适合你的肤色。颜料经常是各种食物中的添加物。不论是染料还是颜料都是用来染布的。这台打印机将输出彩色图表。儿童喜欢看彩色电视。当地人对我们的肤色感到好奇。秋风给枫林涂抹胭红。他反复推敲一个习语以使该句增色。新闻报道常常被夸张。不要因讲义气而影响了你的判断。法官不能让个人感情影响他的裁决。树叶在秋天开始变色。她听到他的话因受窘而脸红了。

translation: vi. 来；开始；出现；发生；变成；到达vt. 做；假装；将满（…岁）int. 嗨！n. (Come)人名；(英)科姆；(阿尔巴)乔梅
examples: The train slowly came to the station.He will come on time even though it rains.They came to a river.I've come for my book.Their wish has come true at last.The film did not come up to my expectations.She had come to see the problem in a new light.We can see comet only when they come close to the earth.She tried to come the innocent with me.His family comes first.
火车缓缓地进站。即使下雨，他还是会准时来的。他们来到河边。我来拿我的书。他们的愿望最终成为现实。这部电影没有达到我的期望。她对这问题已有新的认识。只有当彗星接近地球时，我们才能看得见它们。她在我面前装出清白无辜的样子。他把家庭放在第一位。

translation: adj. 舒适的，舒服的n. 盖被
examples: Were it not for science, we could not live a comfortable live.Neither chair is comfortable.A comfortable house may be an Eden.She has pretty dancing slippers and comfortable bedroom slippers.I won't be comfortable until I know what happened.She grew up in comfortable surroundings.He is comfortable enough to buy a new car.We have a margin comfortable to catch the train.He has a comfortable income.
若非科学，我们无法过着舒适的生活。两把椅子坐起来都不舒服。一个舒适的家可以是一个乐园。她有漂亮的舞鞋和舒适的卧室拖鞋。我只有知道发生了什么事后，才会放下心来。她在舒适的环境中长大。他有足够的钱买一辆新车。我们有充裕的余地去搭那班火车。他有相当宽裕的收入。

translation: n. 公司；陪伴，同伴；连队vi. 交往vt. 陪伴n. (Company)人名；(西)孔帕尼；(英)康帕尼
examples: I work in a small company.The company doubled its size in nine years.The company has connections with a number of Japanese firms.Don't mention it. I've really enjoyed your company.I asked Benny to keep my son company while I went shopping.His father asked him to avoid bad company.Mrs.Johnson straightened up the house before company came.He was appointed captain of a company of rifles.He came in company with a group of girls.May fair winds company your safe return.
我在一家小公司工作。9年来这家公司的规模扩大了一倍。这家公司与几家日本商号有业务往来。不必客气,有你的陪伴,我也很开心。我请本尼在我购物的时候陪伴我儿子。他父亲要他不要交坏朋友。约翰逊太太打扫房子准备接待来聚会的客人。他被任命为步枪连连长。他是和一群女孩子来的。愿和风伴你平安归来。

translation: n. 竞争；比赛，竞赛
examples: Everyone in modern society faces keen competitions.To our satisfaction, he had got the first prize in the diving competition.
现代社会的每个人都面临着激烈的竞争。我们满意的是,他在跳水比赛中获得了一等奖。

translation: n. 作文，作曲，作品；[材] 构成；合成物；成分
examples: We examined the rock to find out its composition.He played many of his compositions for me.`Swan Lake' is one of Tchaikovsky's best-known compositions.I have no idea who decided the composition of the committee.You've made several grammatical mistakes in the composition.The composition has copper and zine in it.
我们检验了这一石块,想弄清它的构成成分。他为我演奏了他的许多乐曲。《天鹅湖》是柴可夫斯基最著名的作品之一。我不知道委员会的成员是由谁选定的。你的作文中犯了几处语法错误。这种合成物里有铜和锌。

translation: n. 计算机；电脑；电子计算机
examples: I'm getting a new computer for birthday present.This computer company was established last year.In addition to giving a general introduction to computer, the course also provides practical experience.I am a computer operator.We should be watchful of computer viruses.We make copies of our computer disks as a safeguard against accidents.
我得到一台电脑作生日礼物。这家电脑公司是去年成立的。课程除了一般介绍电脑知识外，还提供实际操作的机会。我是一名计算机操作人员。我们应该警惕计算机病毒。我们复制了计算机磁盘以防意外。

translation: adj. 自负的；狂想的；逞能的
examples: I dislike conceited persons.You must not think that I was a conceited man.Conceited people never hear anything but praise.Promoted too quickly, the conceited young man became overbearing.He's so conceited that when she refused his invitation, it really put his nose out of joint.
我不喜欢自高自大的人。你不能认为我是高傲的人。凡是爱虚荣的人只听得进赞美的话。提拔得太快, 那个自负的年轻人变得盛气凌人。他很自负，她没接受他的邀请可把他的鼻子气歪了。

translation: n. 音乐会；一致；和谐vt. 使协调；协同安排vi. 协调；协力adj. 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的
examples: The concert will be given on Saturday.It is good to go to a concert for a change.The newspaper gave much publicity to the concert.They did not act in concert with one another.Then powerful and the powerless try to live in concert.We will get together to concert our differences.He refused to concert with his partners.
音乐会将于星期六举行。到音乐会去换换环境比较好。报纸对这次音乐会进行了充分报道。他们的行动互不协调。有权者和无权者和谐一致。我们将聚集一起协调分歧。他拒绝和他的伙伴们合作。

translation: n. 导体；售票员；领导者；管理人
examples: The conductor punched his bus ticket.She knows why the metal is the good conductor.Rubber is not a conductor, and neither is plastics.With his baton the conductor was beating time.Bernstein conducted Mahler like no other conductor.
售票员用剪票夹在他的汽车票上打孔。她知道金属为什么是好的导体。橡胶不是导体，塑料也不是导体。指挥用指挥棒打着拍节。伯恩斯坦指挥马勒作品的方式与其他指挥家都不同。

translation: adj. 自信的；确信的
examples: For my own part, being nice about appearance keeps me confident.I'm confident in the path I have chosen.Your encouragement made me more confident of my future.One has to be confident in himself.We are confident of victory.
就我而论，注重仪表使我自信。我对我自己选择的道路有绝对的自信。你的鼓励使我对我的未来更加有信心。一个人一定要对自己有信心。我们确信能胜利。

translation: n. 祝贺；贺辞
examples: May we proffer you our congratulations?Please give him my congratulations when you see him.I sent her a gift as a token of my congratulation.We must telephone our congratulations to the happy couple.Congratulations on your marriage.
请让我们向你表示祝贺。请见到他时转达我的祝贺。我给她寄去一件礼物表示祝贺。我们得打电话向那对幸福的夫妻表示祝贺。恭贺你喜结良缘。

translation: vt. 连接；联合；关连vi. 连接，连结；联合
examples: The plumber connected up all the pipes and turned on the tap.These terminals are connected to our mainframe computer.Has the phone been connected yet?The police tried to connect him with the murder.I was surprised to hear them mentioned together: I've never connected them before.
管子工连接上所有管子，然后打开了水龙头。这些终端设备都和我们的计算机主机相连。电话接通了吗？警方试图将他与这起谋杀案联系起来。听到有人把他们俩扯在一起,我感到很惊奇,我以前从未想到过他们之间有什么关系。

translation: n. 贡献；捐献；投稿
examples: Don't undervalue Jim's contribution to the research.He has made an important contribution to the company's success.All contribution, however small, will be greatly appreciated.The union successfully negotiated increased employer contributions to the health benefits package.
不要低估了吉姆在研究工作中的贡献。他对公司的成功作出了重要的贡献。所有捐款，无论数目多么少，我们都深表感谢。工会成功地让雇主增加对医疗福利的捐赠。

translation: n. 交谈，会话；社交；交往，交际；会谈；（人与计算机的）人机对话
examples: I listened to their conversation.Did you have a conversation with him?The band drowned our conversation.His French has come on a lot since he joined the conversation class.In everyday conversation, you request people to do things, not "order" them.The professor invited his students to his home for conversation.
我倾听他们的谈话。你和他谈过话了吗？乐队的演奏声把我们谈话的声音淹没了。他自从参加了会话班，法语取得了很大进步。在日常会话中，你是请求别人做事，而不是"命令"他们。教授邀请学生们到自己家里会晤。

translation: vt. 烹调，煮vi. 烹调，做菜n. 厨师，厨子n. (Cook)人名；(英、印)库克
examples: The cook went to see the cake left in the oven.They engaged a cook for the summer.He was a cook before his demobilization.Will she cook dinner this evening?I found it a great trouble to cook by myself.Do you want your vegetables cooked or raw?They are trying to cook up an excuse to implement their proposal.He was sent to prison for cooking the books.
炊事员去照看炉子里的蛋糕了。那个夏天他们雇了一个厨子。他复员以前是一名炊事员。她今晚要做晚饭吗？我发现自己煮是一件很苦恼的事。你要把蔬菜煮熟还是生吃？他们正在努力编造一个理由好实行他们的计划。他因窜改帐目而入狱。

translation: n. 饼干；小甜点
examples: This cookie is neither sweet nor soft.The child reached for another cookie.We had cookies and coffee.
这块饼干既不甜也不软。小孩伸手拿取另一片饼干。我们吃了甜饼和咖啡。

translation: adj. 凉爽的；冷静的；出色的vt. 使…冷却；使…平静下来vi. 变凉；平息n. 凉爽；凉爽的空气adv. 冷静地n. (Cool)人名；(法)科尔；(英)库尔
examples: A brisk walk in cool weather is invigorating.A cool breeze blew from the lake.As it was a hot day, she wore a cool dress.The occasion calls for a cool head.Even when you argue, you should try to keep cool.The official was very cool to the idea of higher taxes.Trees cool the air as well as clean it.Mother put the pie at the window to cool it.I tried to cool her down, but she was too angry.I'm going into the woods to cool off.His anger hasn't cooled yet.I hope the two countries will cool off a bit, or there will be a war.I like to feel the cool of the early morning.Please keep your cool on such occasion.The pleasant cool under the trees refreshed the tired boy.A real warrior can keep cool while fighting a strong enemy.The cool manipulators in Hanoi had exploited America's hesitations and self-doubt.

在凉爽的天气里轻松地散步令人心旷神怡。湖边吹来了一阵凉凉的微风。因为天气热,她穿了一件凉快的衣服。在这样情况下需要有冷静的头脑。即使在争辩时，你也要尽力保持冷静。这个官员对提高税收的意见反应很冷淡。树木不仅能使空气变凉,而且能净化空气。母亲将馅饼放在窗口使其冷却。我想使她平静下来，但是她怒气太大一时消不了。我想进树林子里去凉快一下。他的愤怒尚未平息。我希望两个国家都冷静一点，否则将有一场战争。我喜欢感受清晨的凉爽。在这种场合下,请保持冷静。树荫下宜人的清凉令那个疲倦的男孩恢复了精力。真正的勇士能沉着冷静地应对强大的敌人。善于冷静地操纵这类事的河内统治者大大地钻了美国当局优柔寡断的空子。

translation: vi. 复制；复印；抄袭vt. 复制；复印；抄袭n. 副本；一册；摹仿
examples: The painting is a copy of one in the museum.He asked his secretary to make a copy of the document.This copy does not correspond with the original.I managed to root out a copy of the document.We're offering a fabulous free gift with each copy you buy.We enclose a copy of our latest price list.He was reading a copy of the daily newspaper.Would you copy this letter for me, please?I copied out her notes into my notebook.They copy a great deal during examinations .
这幅画是博物馆中的一幅画的复制品。他叫秘书把文件复制一份。这抄本与原件不符。我好不容易才找到了文件的副本。购买一册就可以得到一份免费好礼。随函寄出我方最新价格表一份。他正在看一份日报。请为我复印一下这封信好吗？我把她的笔记抄在我的笔记本上。他们在考试时大量抄袭。

translation: n. 珊瑚；珊瑚虫adj. 珊瑚的；珊瑚色的n. (Coral)人名；(英、法、西、葡)科拉尔
examples: Coral is formed by certain types of polyp.There are lots of coral in the sea.Although the coral is moveless , it is alive.The ship was wrecked on a coral reef.Beyond the coral reef the open sea is dark blue.It is reported that the coral reefs are being destroyed.I was going to wear a coral dress.Kate is wearing a coral necklace.
珊瑚是由某些水螅体构成的。海里有许多珊瑚。珊瑚虽然一动不动,但其实是活体。那艘船触珊瑚礁失事。珊瑚礁之外的大海是一片深蓝色。据报道，珊瑚礁正遭受破坏。我将穿着珊瑚色的连衣裙。凯特戴著一条珊瑚项炼。

translation: n. （美）玉米；（英）谷物；[皮肤] 鸡眼vt. 腌；使成颗粒n. (Corn)人名；(英、法、瑞典)科恩
examples: Corn shot up to seventy-three cents a bushel.The corn grinds easily.The ground was plowed and planted with corn.There was an abundance of corn last year.This is a romantic ballad that is pure corn.The farmer scattered corn for the chicken.They mix the bran and corn powder together to feed the pigs.
谷物猛涨到一蒲式耳七十三美分。谷物容易磨成粉。地翻耕后种上了玉米。去年玉米丰收。这是一首极为伤感的浪漫小曲。农夫撒谷子喂鸡。他们把麦麸和玉米粉混合起来喂猪。

translation: n. 角落，拐角处；地区，偏僻处；困境，窘境vi. 囤积；相交成角vt. 垄断；迫至一隅；使陷入绝境；把…难住n. (Corner)人名；(法)科尔内；(英)科纳
examples: The news soon spread to the farthest corner.She sat in the corner, watching my every move.She waved to me as she turned the corner.There's a grocer's at the corner of the street.I'm in a tight corner at present.The interviewer had driven her into a corner.Don't try to corner your spouse.It's rather dangerous to corner at speed.He wants to corner the beer market.Our goal is to corner the market nationwide.She bought a box of chocolates at the corner store.
消息很快传到最远的角落。她坐在角落里注视著我的一举一动。她拐弯时向我挥了挥手。在街道的转弯处有一个食品杂货店。我眼下的处境十分不妙。面试主持人把她追问得很窘。不要让你的爱人为难。高速转弯是相当危险的。他想垄断啤酒市场。我们的目标是要垄断全国市场。她在街头小店购得一盒巧克力。

translation: vt. 改正；告诫vi. 调整；纠正错误adj. 正确的；恰当的；端正的
examples: Your answer to the question is correct.So far no correct conclusion has arrived at.Such casual dress would not be correct for a formal occasion.Correct the errors in the following sentences, if any.She criticizes him. She is trying to correct his bad habits.
你对这个问题的回答是正确的。到目前为止,还没有得出任何正确的结论。这样的便服不宜在正式的场合穿。如果下列句子中有错,请改正。她批评他,想纠正他的坏习惯。

translation: vt. 花费；使付出；使花许多钱；估价，估算成本vi. 花费n. 费用，代价，成本；损失
examples: We calculated the cost of building a new house .We have to sum up the costs of production.I'm determined to attain my purpose at any cost.He saved his daughter at the cost of his life.He was ordered to pay USD2000 costs.It will cost 5000 at the lowest computation.That car must have cost a bundle.How much do the vegetables cost?Dangerous driving could cost you your life.The accident cost me a visit to the doctor.Her irresponsible behaviour cost her father many sleepless nights.The work was costed by the engineer at $50,000.The real cost of this has already been costed out.
我们计算了造1座新房子的费用。我们得计算一下生产成本。我决心不惜任何代价达到目的。他以牺牲自己的生命挽救了女儿。他被责令缴纳2000美元诉讼费用。估计最少也值5000英镑。这辆汽车一定值很多钱。这些蔬菜值多少钱？开车不注意安全有生命危险。那事故害得我去看了一趟医生。她那不负责任的行为使她父亲许多夜不得安眠。这项工程据工程师估价为50 000美元。已经对其实际成本进行过估算。

translation: n. 棉花；棉布；棉线vi. 一致；理解；和谐；亲近adj. 棉的；棉制的n. (Cotton)人名；(英、西、葡)科顿；(法)戈登
examples: India exports tea and cotton to many different countries.This district used to grow cotton on a large scale.The import of cotton goods went up sharply in 1986.Cotton material was not known in Europe until much later.In hot weather cloths made of a porous material like cotton are best.Cotton is more comfortable to wear than nylon.
印度向许多国家出口茶叶和棉花。这个地区过去大量种棉花。在1986年，棉织品的进口猛增。直到很晚之后，欧洲才知道棉花布料。热天穿棉布之类有渗透性的材料制成的衣服最为适宜。棉布比尼龙穿着舒服。

translation: n. 咳嗽，咳嗽声；咳嗽病vt. 咳出vi. 咳嗽n. (Cough)人名；(英)考夫
examples: Cover your mouth when you cough.I cough a great deal last night.She cough to give him the hint that he shall go.You really ought to/should do something about that cough!The baby has a cough.She gave a quiet cough to attract my attention.
咳嗽时要捂上嘴。我昨夜咳嗽得很厉害。她咳了一声，向他暗示他该走了。你咳嗽那麽厉害，真得治一治了！婴儿咳嗽了。她轻轻地咳了一声好引起我注意。

translation: aux. 能够v. 能（can的过去式）
examples: We could relax the procedure slightly in your case.Could this verb be used in progressive form?I can't sing now, but I could when I was young.The exam results could determine your career.
我们可以根据你的情况通融一些。这个动词可以用进行式吗？现在我不会唱歌了，但我年轻的时候会。考试成绩可能会决定你的前途。

translation: vt. 计算；认为vi. 计数；有价值n. 计数；计算；伯爵n. (Count)人名；(法、德、南非)伯爵(欧洲贵族头衔)， 康特(人名)
examples: Material control and cycle count.It's not humanly possible to count so quickly.Fruity cocktails count as health food, study finds.Since most countries already have too many laws, a pause for parliamentary reflection might count as progress.We cannot always count on our parents.I need to count on you to finish this for me.Take your blood count first, please.There is a high pollen count in the air.It will count up to a large amount.Then check if the line count exceeds the page length.The count lived in that big house.His father was the Count of Montpellier.
基本掌握物料控制及周期计算知识。计算得这么快是人力无法做到的。研究发现，水果鸡尾酒可被视为健康食品。大多数地区已经立了太多的法律，中止国会审议工作或可视为一种进步。我们不能总是依赖父母。我必须依赖你来帮我完成这件事。请先做一次血球计数。空气中有很高的花粉计数。总数将相当可观。然后检查行的总数是否超过页长。伯爵曾经住在那幢大房子里。他的父亲曾是蒙彼利埃伯爵。

translation: n. 国家，国土；国民；乡下，农村；乡村；故乡adj. 祖国的，故乡的；地方的，乡村的；国家的；粗鲁的；乡村音乐的
examples: China is a developing country.After many years abroad, he wanted to return home to his country.The country is very green in spring.She lived her whole life in the country.We passed through miles of wooded country.This is unknown country to me.After ten years in the city, he is still country.I strictly criticize those country leaders who advocate crossover.
中国是一个发展中国家。在国外多年后，他想回到故乡。春天的时候，乡村一片青葱碧绿。她在农村度过一生。我们通过了好几英里的树木茂密的地带。我以前没到过这里/我对这问题一窍不通。他在城里待了十年，仍是乡气十足。我强力谴责鼓吹跨党派投票的国家领导。

translation: n. 农村，乡下；乡下的全体居民
examples: They lived a tranquil life in the countryside.I feel healthier after a visit to the countryside.Modern agriculture is spoiling our beautiful countryside.These are fresh eggs from the countryside.
他们在乡下过着宁静的生活。到乡下走了一趟后我觉得身体更健康。现代农业正在破坏我们美丽的农村。这是刚从农村来的新鲜鸡蛋。

translation: n. 堂兄弟姊妹；表兄弟姊妹
examples: I hear from my cousin every two weeks.He is a distant cousin of mine.
我每两星期就会收到我表哥的来信。他是我的一位远房表亲。

translation: vt. 包括；采访，报导；涉及；行走（一段路程）；掩护；翻唱n. 封面，封皮；盖子；掩蔽物;幌子，借口vi. 覆盖；代替；敷衍；给…投保；n. (Cover)人名；(英)科弗；(意)科韦尔
examples: The front cover of the novel has been torn off.I can't make the cover of the tin fit on.The car should be housed with a cover for a longer time's parking.Tooth-colored porcelain will cover the metal crowns.The collective trichome cover of a plant surface is called pubescence.Snow covered the ground.The talks are expected to cover other topics too.The dictionary's articles cover a wide range of topics.We tried to find cover from the storm.Do not try to cover a mistake.
这本小说的封面已被撕掉。我无法把这罐头的盖子盖上。长时间的存放汽车，应给汽车罩上套子。金属表面覆盖和牙齿一样颜色地瓷。植物表面聚集的毛状物称为柔毛。积雪覆盖了大地。会谈估计还会涉及别的问题。这本字典的文章包含各种各样的话题。我们设法寻找遮蔽暴风雨的地方。不要试图掩盖错误。

translation: n. 奶牛，母牛；母兽vt. 威胁，恐吓
examples: The cow has produced a calf.Do you know how to milk a cow?I'm sure it was deliberately done to cow us.
这母牛生了一头小牛。你知道怎么挤牛奶吗？我确信,这一事件经过精心策划,目的是恐吓我们。

translation: n. 撞碎；坠毁；破产；轰隆声；睡觉vi. 摔碎；坠落；发出隆隆声；(金融企业等)破产vt. 打碎；使坠毁、撞坏；擅自闯入
examples: He crashed his car into a wall.The rocks crashed down onto the car.She was frightened that the plane would crash.The plane crashed (into the mountain).The thunder crashed.What did you type in wrong to get it to crash?Mind if I crash (out) on your floor tonight?Can I crash with you for tonight?The building fell with a crash as loud as thunder.It's a marvel that he wasn't killed in the car crash.His car was badly wrecked after a crash with the wall.It was a miracle that most the passengers survived the plane crash.The stock market crash ruined many people.The great financial crash in 1929 ruined international trade.A stock market crash means it's time to reinvest.The project was launched on a crash basis.They gave me a three-day crash course.About a week was spent in the first semester on a crash course in computing.

他的汽车撞到了墙上。岩石轰隆一声砸在汽车上。她害怕飞机会坠毁。飞机撞毁(在山上)了。雷声隆隆。你输错了什么使系统崩溃了?今晚我在你家打地铺行吗?今晚能在你这里借宿吗?建筑物轰隆一声倒塌了，声如雷鸣。他在撞车中没撞死真万幸。他的车撞上墙以后被严重破坏了。大部分乘客从撞机事件中生还,这真是个奇迹。股票市场的崩溃使很多人破产。1929年的经济大萧条摧毁了国际贸易。股市暴跌意味着再次买入。此计划作为最优先项目而付诸实施。他们给我上了三天的速成课程。第一学期里差不多用了一周来进行计算的速成课程。

translation: n. 奶油，乳脂；精华；面霜；乳酪
examples: She ladled cream over her pudding.A dish of strawberries and cream is not to be despised.This cream will soften up your skin.Proverbs are the cream of a nation's thought.She was fashionably turned out in cream trousers and a red sweater.Many special schools cream off the highest achievers.Cream the butter and sugar together.
她在布丁上浇了一勺奶油。一盘草莓加乳酪应该算不差了。这种面霜会使你皮肤柔软。谚语是一国的思想精华。她穿着米色长裤和红套衫,打扮得很入时。许多专业学校录取了成绩最好的学生。把黄油和糖搅成糊状。

translation: n. 信用，信誉；[金融] 贷款；学分；信任；声望vt. 相信，信任；把…归给，归功于；赞颂
examples: Credit counseling helped us get out from under.Where can I see my credit score?They are working hard for the credit of China.You must pass the examination to get credit for the course.I give them full credit for their work.He was given credit for his work.He is very awkward about give us further credit.No credit is given at this shop.Is this item a debit or a credit?How much do I have to my credit?At the time, we used to credit everything to one person.I can credit all that you are telling me .I want to credit this to my account.
信用咨询使我们免除了忧虑我在哪能看到我的信用分数?他们在为中国的荣誉而努力工作。你必须通过考试才能获得那门课程的学分。我高度赞扬了他们的工作。他的工作受到赞扬。他为给我们进一步地增加贷款而为难。这家商店概不赊欠。这笔帐属于借方还是属于贷方?我们银行户头上还有多少存款？那时大家把什么都归功于一个人。我可以相信你告诉我的一切。我想把这个记在我的账上。

translation: n. 产量；农作物；庄稼；平头vt. 种植；收割；修剪；剪短vi. 收获
examples: The flood did a lot of damage to the crops.We have had the biggest wheat crop ever this year.The crop died due to a lack of rain for 5 months.The programme brought quite a crop of complaints from viewers.She asked the barber to crop her hair short.Sheep and cows had cropped the grass short.The beans cropped well this year.The subject cropped up as we talked.It had never occurred to her that a new possibility would crop up abruptly.
洪水毁坏了大量农作物。今年我们的小麦收获量是有史以来最好的。5个月没下雨了,庄稼枯死了。该节目招致观众诸多不满.她叫理发师把她的头发剪短了。羊和牛把草啃短了。今年豆子丰收。我们交谈时无意中涉及到了这个问题。她万万没有想到会突然出现一种新的可能性。

translation: n. 交叉，十字；十字架，十字形物vi. 交叉；杂交；横过vt. 杂交；渡过；使相交adj. 交叉的，相反的；乖戾的；生气的
examples: It's very dangerous for children to cross the busy street.Meet me at the point where the two paths cross.The experts in the zoo tried to cross a leopard with a lion.He crosses me in everything.We can cross his name off the list as he's not coming.My mother crossed an acquaintance on the street.He has been crossed in his plans.She wore a small silver cross on a chain round her neck.If you can't sign your name, make a cross instead.A mule is a cross between a mare and a donkey.You must bear the cross of your disability.There was an accident yesterday at the cross part of three roads.Finally, it turned out to be a result cross to our purpose.He was very cross because his roommate took his umbrella without getting his permission.A mule is a cross between a horse and a donkey.Studies on Generic Cross between Solanum lycopersicoides and Lyco-persi con sp.

对孩子们来说,穿过车来车往的街道很危险。我们在那两条路的交叉点见面吧。动物园里的专家们试图使豹与狮子杂交。他处处与我作对。他既然不来了,我们可以把他的名字从名单中划掉。我妈妈在街上遇到一个熟人。他的计划遭到阻碍。她脖子上戴著项链,上面挂着个小的银制十字架。你如果不会签名，画一个十字也可以。骡子是母马和公驴的杂交后代。你必须忍受你身体残障的苦难。昨天,在三条路的交叉路段,发生了一起事故。最终的结果竟与我们的目的相反。他非常生气,因为他的室友未经同意就把他的伞拿走了。骡是马和驴杂交的产物。类番茄茄与番茄属间有性杂交的研究。

translation: n. 十字路口；杂交；横渡；横道v. 横越（cross的现在分词）
examples: When we need to cross the street, we should always use the pedestrian crossings or pedestrian bridges.We came to a crossing.He was arrested by guards at the border crossing.My hat was blown off while I was crossing the bridge.Our bus is now crossing the Garden Bridge.When the enemy soldiers were crossing the river, we fell on them.
过马路时，我们一定要走人行横道或过街天桥。我们来到一个十字路口。他在越境地点被卫兵逮捕。过桥时风吹掉了我的帽子。我们的公车现在正穿过园林桥。敌军正在渡河时，我们向他们发起进攻。

translation: vt. 叫喊；哭出；大声说n. 叫喊；叫声；口号；呼叫vi. 哭；叫；喊
examples: She cried with grief when she heard news of her friend's death.She began to cry in the face of failure.He cried that he had found the key.The girl in the river is crying for help.The public raised a great hue and cry about tax hikes.Very soon he heard a raven cry outside.Her feelings were relieved by a good cry.She has a long cry when her favorite doll is broken.He heard a cry for help, and he rushed out of the office.A feeble cry came from the next room.
听到朋友死亡的消息，她难过地哭了。面对失败，她开始哭了起来。他大声地叫喊找到了钥匙。掉进河里的女孩正喊救命呢。公众对税赋增加表示了强烈抗议。很快他就听见了外面乌鸦的叫声。她大哭一场，发泄她的感情。她心爱的洋娃娃坏了,为此她哭了好长一阵子。他听到有人喊救命,就冲出了办公室。从隔壁房间里传来低弱的叫喊声。

translation: n. 杯子；奖杯；酒杯vt. 使成杯状；为…拔火罐
examples: This cup is made of stainless steel.Please fill the cup with water.Would you like a cup of tea?Eight horses will race for the cup.When we want to hear something more clearly we cup our hands behind our ears.He would cup his chin in the hollow of his hand when he had something on his mind.
这只杯子是不锈钢做的。请把这个杯子装满水。你想喝杯茶吗？将有八匹马参赛争夺奖杯。我们想听得更清晰一些时，就把双手弯成杯状放在耳后。他有心事时总是把手掌心托住自己的下巴。

translation: n. 碗柜；食橱
examples: I put the dishes in the cupboard.He stored foods in his cupboard.All our glass and china is kept in the cupboard.In the dark he ran up against a cupboard.Please clear out the things in the cupboard.Hang up your coat in the cupboard.Ella had taken a dress out of the cupboard.You must clear out the things in the cupboard.The cupboard was stuffed with old fishing tackle.
我把菜放在碗橱里。他把食品存放在碗橱里。我们所有的玻璃和陶瓷器皿都放在柜橱里。他在黑暗中撞着了一只碗橱。请把碗橱里的东西拿走。把你的衣服挂在衣柜里。埃拉已经从衣柜里拿出了一套衣服。你必须把壁橱里的东西清除一空。小橱里塞满了旧的钓鱼用具。

translation: n. 伤口；切口；削减；（服装等的）式样；削球；切入vt. [机] 切割；削减；缩短；刺痛vi. [机] 切割；相交；切牌；停拍；不出席adj. 割下的；雕过的；缩减的
examples: This knife is not sharp enough to cut the steak.Don't cut your finger on the broken glass.Face round, please, so that I can cut your hair at the back.Please cut out the expense in order to save the money.His cruel remarks cut me deeply.He insisted that we give him the last cut before every deal.The fate of the game will be decided in the final cut of the cards.His cheek was badly scarred by a knife cut.He had a finger cut off by a machine while working.I don't like the cut of his new suit.Before this play is broadcast several cuts must be made.
这把刀子不够利,无法切牛排。别让碎玻璃割伤你的手。转一下头, 好让我可以剪你后面的头发。为了节省钱,请削减开支。他那无情的话太伤我的心了。他坚持让我们在每次发牌前都让他来最后切牌。这局牌的命运将由最后的切牌决定。他的面颊上留有严重的刀疤。他在工作时被机器切掉了一个手指。我不喜欢他那套新衣服的式样。这个剧目播出前必须经过数次剪辑。

translation: 要求；需要；提倡；邀请；为…叫喊
examples: The situation calls for prompt action.The negotiations will call for considerable dexterity.They called for a radical reform of our tax system.We will call for her early tomorrow morning.The forecast calls for snow flurries later tonight.The regulations call for working in three shifts.The bricklayer on the roof was calling for more tiles.
形势所迫，必须立即采取行动。进行这些谈判需要相当圆滑的手腕。他们要求对税收制度进行根本改革。我们明天一早就去接她。天气预报报道今天后半夜将有阵雪。章程规定按三班制工作。房顶上的瓦工招呼再送些瓦上去。

translation: 召集；召来
examples: Summon the pupils together in the school hall.Call up reserves and as many recruits as possible.How many friends did you call in?We are all invited to take part in the pageant.I found him working in his library when I called.Our neighbor popped in for a short call.I was paging through a magazine when he came in.A dog scratched at the door to be let in.We pay a flat rate for every telephone call.I need to call my jobber to sell some shares.The library is calling in all outstanding books.They have not been as umbrageous in demanding their territory back.Certain bank notes were called in.I don't think he will call back his promise.
把学生召集到学校的礼堂里。意思就是召集后备部队和尽可能多的新兵。你邀请了多少朋友？我们全都被邀请参加这次盛典。我去拜访他时看到他在书房里工作。我们的邻居突然来做短暂的拜访。他进来时我在翻阅一本杂志。狗嚓嚓地抓门要想进来。我们打电话每次付相同的费用。我需要给我的股票经纪人打电话卖些股票。图书馆要求归还所有逾期的图书。他们从未以如此好战的态度要求归还领土。通告收回某种钞票。我认为他不会收回他的诺言。

translation: 访问，拜访；号召，请求
examples: He called on the workers to fight for their rights.I'd like to call on you this Sunday.I'm going to call on one of my former classmates.You'd better call on your friends to help you.
他号召工人为争取自己的权利而斗争。我想这个星期天来找你。我要去看望我的一位老同学。你最好请朋友来帮你。

translation: 打电话给；召集；使想起；提出
examples: Forgive me so early to call up you please.She can still call up scenes of childhood.Round up a few friends to help you.Call up reserves and as many recruits as possible.He was called up at the beginning of the war.The government is calling up men for the army.
请原谅我这么早给你打电话。她仍能想起儿时的情景。召集一些朋友来帮你忙。意思就是召集后备部队和尽可能多的新兵。战争开始时他就被征召入伍了。政府正在征召入伍。

translation: 关心，照顾；喜欢
examples: The sick child was well cared for night and day.It seemed to be her mission to care for her brother's children.I'm fond of her but I don't care for her husband.He likes pop; he doesn't care for classic music.
那个生病的孩子日夜受到很好的看护。照顾她兄弟的孩子似乎成了她一生的使命。我喜欢她，但不喜欢她丈夫。他喜欢流行歌曲，不喜欢古典音乐。

translation: 夺去；获得；使丧命；成功地处理
examples: A man came into the house and yanked him off.He carried off the treasure from the island.John carried off all the prizes in the contest.The chairman tried to carry his point.
一个人走进屋子把他带走了。他从岛上带走了财富。约翰获得了比赛的全部奖品。主席企图使他的观点获得赞成。

translation: 继续参与
examples: We'll carry on our conversation tomorrow.After a short break, the match went on.
我们明天将继续进行会谈。经过短暂的休息，比赛继续进行。

translation: vt. 执行，实行；贯彻；实现；完成
examples: He will carry out his plan.He hasn't the funds to carry out his design.He made no attempt to carry out his undertaking.Officers must carry out the wishes of members.
他要执行他的计划。他没有资金来施行他的设计。他无意实现他的诺言。官员们必须实现委员们的愿望。

translation: 赶上，追上；逮捕；处罚
examples: She walked too slowly to catch up with us.I have to work hard to catch up with the other students.Old age and infirmity had begun to catch up with him.
她走得太慢，跟不上我们。要想赶上其他同学，我得特别努力才行。他开始显出年老体衰的样子了。

translation: 变成；把…变成；兑换
examples: She came from nowhere into national fame.A tadpole is transformed into a frog.
她从无名之辈变成全国闻名。蝌蚪变成青蛙。

translation: 报到，记录；到达并登记
examples: Where can I check in?Passengers should check in for flight BA 125 to Berlin.Passengers should check in one hour before their flight time at the latest.You can check in at the reception desk.Is there a place we can check in our coats?I'm just going to check in these books at the library.
在哪儿办理登记手续？去柏林的英航125航班旅客请办理登机手续。乘客至迟应在班机起飞前一小时办理登机手续。你可到接待处登记报到。有暂存大衣的地方吗?我要去图书馆还这些书。

translation: 检验；结账离开；通过考核；盖章
examples: Mrs. Hyde has checked out this morning.The hotel insists that guests check out of their rooms before 11 o'clock in the morning.Mr Cass checked out before they reached the hospital.
海德夫人今天上午已经结帐走了。这家旅馆一定要客人在上午11点钟前结帐后离开房间。他们到医院之前卡斯先生就死了。

translation: 清理；放晴；整理；打扫
examples: It's very likely to clear up by and by.Let me clear up the broken glass before someone walks on it.We should clean up the past-due bills.I must spend a few days to clear off all my work.It cleared up soon after the rain.I believe it will be cold and clear.I'd like to clear up two or three points.The water of the lake is green and clear.
很可能不久要放晴了。在有人踩上碎玻璃之前让我把它清扫一下。我们应该清理逾期票据。我必须用几天功夫来清理我所有的工作。雨後天气迅速放晴。看来明天要转冷放晴了。有两三个问题我想澄清一下。湖水碧绿澄清。

translation: v. 发生；产生；改变方向
examples: How did it come about that he knew where we were?Expected or required but not yet having come about.How did this come about?
他是怎么知道我们在什麽地方的呢？期待发生的被期望或要求但仍未发生的这是怎么发生的?

translation: v. 偶遇；无意中发现；讲得清楚明白；给人…印象
examples: We've just come across an old friend.Perhaps I shall come across him in France.I came across this book in an old bookstore in London.He spoke for a long time but his meaning did not really come across.
我们刚碰到了一位老朋友。也许我会在法国遇见他。我在伦敦一家旧书店里发现了这本书。他讲了很长时间，但他的意思没有人真正理解。

translation: 回来；记起；恢复原状，重新流行
examples: There is no telling when she will come back.He came back in the late afternoon.I came back from my holiday with renewed strength.The holiday gave him back his good spirits.Vera cast her mind back to her wedding day.It brought back to me -ies of my schooldays.Sometime you might want to come back in some way.That they've hung on and come back is amazing.Though Ford does well with some models such as the Mustang sports car, it is weak in minivans and the smaller saloons that are coming back into fashion.He hit back at his opponents in the debate.Every time I express an opinion, she argues back.
说不准她什么时候回来。他在傍晚回来。我度假回来，体力得到恢复。假期使他恢复了愉快的情绪。维拉回想起她婚礼日的情景。它使我回想起我的学生时代。有朝一日你会以某种方式卷土重来。他们能够坚持下去并卷土重来这个事实是令人惊异的。尽管，福特在运动汽车野马运作良好，而在如今重新流行起来的迷你型和小型轿车方面却是其软肋。在辩论中他积极反驳对手。每当我发表意见时，她总是反驳。

translation: 下来，降落；流传下来；倒塌；落魄，失势
examples: The grain crop has gone down this year.Sale is down a bit due to the revaluation.He landed on his feet after being down and out.Since he lost the job, he has really come down in the world.The tals have come down from the old times.Few of his works will go down to posterity.
今年的粮食作物产量下降了。由于货币升值销售额有下降。经过贫困潦倒以后，他重新站了起来。自从他失业以后，他的确过着穷困潦倒的生活。这些传说是从古老的年代流传下来的。他的作品没有几件会流传到后世。

translation: 来自；出生于
examples: Most of these children come from broken families.They love paintings from the Orient.These English words derive from Greek.This chopstick dance comes from Mongolia.
这些孩子中的多数人来自婚姻破裂的家庭。他们喜欢来自东方的绘画。这些英文字起源于希腊文。筷子舞起源于蒙古的舞蹈。

translation: 进来；到达；流行起来
examples: He often asked Philip to come in for a chat.His wife dashed in breathlessly.The searchlights were ineffectual in the fog.The new traffic regulations have come into play.
他经常邀菲利浦进来闲谈。他的妻子上气不接下气地冲了进来。探照灯在雾中不起作用。新的交通规则起作用了。

translation: 举行，成功；表现；脱离
examples: These stains won't come off, I'm afraid.The tennis finals will come off tomorrow.Did your proposed trip to Rome ever come off?Her attempt to break the world record nearly came off.He always comes off badly in fights.A button has come off my coat.
我看，这些污点去不掉。网球决赛将于明天举行。你提出的到罗马旅行，后来去了吗？她想要打破世界纪录，已接近成功。他在拳击比赛中总是很糟糕。我的大衣掉了一颗扣子。

translation: v. 快点；开始；要求；上演；跟着来；突然产生
examples: Suddenly it came on me where I had lost my keys.My parents have never come on us for anything.It's getting colder: winter is coming on.I think I have a cold coming on.His French has come on a lot since he joined the conversation class.
我突然记起把钥匙丢在哪里了。我的父母从来没向我们要求过任何东西。天渐冷了，冬天来了。我看我要感冒了。他自从参加了会话班，法语取得了很大进步。

translation: 出现；出版；结果是
examples: Bats come out only at night.Hot weather makes her come out in a rash.Her best qualities come out in a crisis.That magazine comes out once a month.Please tell me how the voting came out.She's been much happier since she came out.The governor came out in favor of tax breaks.
蝙蝠只在晚上出来活动。因天气炎热，她起了皮疹。在危急关头显露出了她的优秀品质。那个杂志每月出一期。请告诉我选举结果如何。她公开了自己是同性恋者以后就快活多了。这位政府官员公开宣布赞成停止征税

translation: v. 想起；共计
examples: The bill came to five pounds fifty pence.He will come to soon after the operation.The farm came to him on his father's death.We came to an amicable agreement.
这个帐单总计5镑15便士。手术后不久他就会醒来。他父亲死时把农场留给他了。我们达成了友好的协议。

translation: 实现，成真；成为现实
examples: His dream will come true sooner or later.Her wish to become a doctor has come true.All our dreams can come true if we have the courge to pursue them.People think all they need to do is endure one crazy, intense, job-free creative burst and their dreams will come true.
他的理想迟早会实现。她想当医生的愿望实现了。只要有勇气去追求，一切梦想皆可成真。人们认为他们所需要做的事是忍耐一个疯狂，强烈的，无责任的创意突发而他们的梦想将成真。

translation: 走近；发生；开始；上升；发芽；被提出
examples: The snowdrops are just beginning to come up.You've come up in the world, haven't you?He came up and introdued himself.He was born poor,and came up the hard way.The question hasn't come up yet.The flowers are just beginning to come up.
雪花莲刚刚开始长出地面。你的地位已经上升了,是吗?他走上前来并作了自我介绍。他出身贫寒，通过坚韧不拔的努力而获成功。这个问题还没有被提出来。花刚开始长出地面。

translation: 把...比作，比喻为
examples: He compared the girl to the moon in the poem.They all started to compare him to Lei Feng.
他在诗中把那姑娘比作月亮。他们都开始把他比作雷锋。

translation: 与…相比较
examples: That ring is beans compared with the crown jewels.I'm afraid my English compares poorly with hers.
与皇冠上的宝石相比那枚戒指根本不值什么钱。恐怕我的英语同她的英语相比要差得多。

translation: 连接到，相连
examples: These terminals are connected to our mainframe computer.A point considered to be at nominal zero potential and to which all other potentials in the circuit are referred, often, but not always, connected to the actual surface of the earth; as a verb to connect to a ground. Also called earth.Provide information to help you connect to the internet if you have not do so already.
这些终端设备都和我们的计算机主机相连。电路中的一个参考点，该点电位作为标称的零电位，其它所有电位均相对于该点而定。经常，但并非总是，将该点直接连接到地。作为动词，指连接到地线上的过程，也称作接地。如果您还没与Internet连接，它会提供您如何与Internet连接的信息。

translation: 连接；与…联系
examples: Railway lines link country towns with the capital.The two rooms connect by a corridor.She had to sever all ties with her parents.She is in direct contact with the general manager.
铁路把各个城镇与首都连接起来。那两个房间以走廊连接。她不得不断绝与父母的一切联系。她与总经理直接联系。

translation: v. 削减；砍倒；杀死；删节；胜过
examples: The workers had to take a cut in pay.They are trying to whittle down our salaries.You'd better cut your report to five pages.Not a single word in the document can be cut.A child was struck down by lightning in the storm.He knocked down his opponent with a powerful left.He is said to have been blasted down by his nephew.The king put down the uprising and killed all the slaves involved.
工人们只得同意削减工资。他们正著手削减我们的薪水。你最好把报告删减到五页。这个文件中的文字，一个也不许删减。暴风雨中，一个小孩被雷电击倒。他一记有力的左手拳将对手击倒。据说他是被他的侄子杀死的。国王镇压了那次起义，杀死了所有参加起义的奴隶。

translation: 切断；中断；使死亡；剥夺继承权
examples: A storm that cut off power to the whole region.Just when she had reached the most important point we were cut off.The village is cut off by the flood.They were then almost completely cut off from the outside world.He cut off the branches from the trunk.Please help me to cut off the rinds of lemons.The shark's dorsal fin was cut off by the fisherman.A generator may cut off if it is overtaxed.
切断了整个地区电力供应的暴风雨她刚刚讲到最要紧的地方，我们的电话就被切断了。村子被洪水隔绝。这时他们和外界几乎完全隔绝了。他把树干上的小分枝都剪掉。请帮我去掉柠檬的皮。鲨鱼的背鳍被渔夫割了下来。发电机要是过荷，它可能会停止运转。

translation: vt. 切碎；抨击
examples: Cut up the carrot before you put them into the pot.My mother would always cut up meat for our dog.Give up blaming and berating yourself.Whoever rips up the agreement will be condemned.
把胡萝卜切碎後再放进锅内。母亲经常为我们的狗把肉切碎。给自己放弃谴责自己的权利。不管谁撕毁协议都要受到谴责。
